CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sita Vilosa
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sorry, but I'm really busy right now. If you have any business with me, talk to me later... But don't forget to tell me when you see me tomorrow, Vernika…]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Sorry... I didn't have enough time.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: ... I did a good job, right?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cinia Pacifica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The perfect blend of wit and beauty. A master of the arts, both literary and martial. The only person this could describe is Cinia Pacifica... What an intriguing story.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I've been looking forward to this.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Oh look, magic. Do be careful now.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Was this outcome ever in doubt?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I refuse to acknowledge this insult!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F2_DOWN: Your tastes are as poor as your estate!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F3_UP: From now on, I shall entrust my future to you.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F3_DOWN: I'm afraid I don't care much for this.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Why won't you say something for all I've done?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Luthica Preventer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [When I needed help, Jaina was there. I would like to repay the favor to both her and you, her knights. Wherever I go, I will lead the charge. Rest assured and focus on your fights.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Crux Knight Luthica, at your service.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F3_DOWN: It'll be hard to find a use for this.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy at the moment.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Please give me a little more time.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I hope this brings you joy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Iri Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This isn't right. Even though those Scardels and the Crescents are Elders, they shouldn't be ordering you around like this. If they don't like me, then they should at least have the decency to tell it to my face... Those old cowards.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Face the power of my magic!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We'll see what comes of this.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F2_DOWN: What is this supposed to be?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Nold
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The other students will be really shocked to see you like this in the school.] [My looks were designed with them in mind.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: To think that someone like me would have to do something like this...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Ginger
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What? Do you have an issue? That guy's already caused me a ton of trouble. I don't care anymore. You beat me, so do whatever you want with me.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We'll see what happens next time.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: What do you think? Do you finally understand my power?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Curious Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The Twilight Wolf? Are you going to hunt it, Sita? Take me with you!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You were teasing me, weren't you? You think I'm just a kid! Do you want to die?! ]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: You were teasing me, weren't you?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: I'll show you the difference between us!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Who's the real kid now, huh?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: What kind of abuse is this?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: It... It was because you didn't give me enough time!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I just don't like Nold! It- It's not like I think your uniform is cute or anything, so don't get any ideas! It's not like I wanted to wear it!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: How can you make me do something like this?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Of course it ended up like this! I don't have that kind of experience!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: You should be grateful for my kindness!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Sita

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Sorry... I didn't have enough time.

CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: It's a pleasure to see you!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Talk to me later. I'm busy right now.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Shouldn't I be appreciated for all I've done?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's been a long time since I wore anything this fancy. Heh. I suppose I have Jaina to thank for this.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry. I'm a little busy at the moment.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Iri

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Vernika

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kendo Sita

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chess Cinia

CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I need to learn from this.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Talk to me later. I'm busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cheerleader Iri

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika, it's hot...]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Sorry... I didn't have enough time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Cinia

CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Oh look, magic. Do be careful now.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Was this outcome ever in doubt?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I only lost because it's too hot.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Talk to me later. I'm busy right now.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Shouldn't I be appreciated for all I've done?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Thanks to Jaina, I got to spend some time here. When I get back to headquarters, I'll bring her a gift.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry. I'm a little busy at the moment.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This... is the sea? Incredible! And that water moving toward me is called a tide? I heard that the sea is salty. Is that true? The sea at night... It's a little cold.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Face the power of my magic!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: It's only because of the weather.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sita, if you stay in the water too long, it's bad for the skin. Playing with water is fine, but how about taking a rest in the shade?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lightseeker Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Tell me how to turn a vampire back into a human. Crux is supposed to be a fountain of knowledge, isn't it? Tell me! Jaina said she'd tell me as soon as I became a knight!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: We have to find a way.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Sorry... I didn't have enough time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Foreign Student Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [So this is a public school uniform? It's splendid! This is an excellent design for ordinary people...]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: I suppose you'll have to do.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Talk to me later. I'm busy right now.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Shouldn't I be appreciated for all I've done?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Blue Reaper Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't take another step! I won't spare anyone who wants to harm Jaina!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry. I'm a little busy at the moment.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lovestruck Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Red hair like the twilight... Those blue eyes behind her glasses... That gentle smile, even when no one is around to see it... I've made up my mind. That girl will be mine.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Night Denizen Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sorry, Sita. I can't walk to school each morning with you anymore, but don't worry. I'll invite you over tomorrow night... Come quickly, Sita. I miss you... You'll be so beautiful in the moonlight... Hee hee.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Thorn Witch Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Please don't wait for me. I'm not the same big sister you remember... I miss you... Cinia.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F2_DOWN: I'm afraid I don't need it.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Do you think this is enough?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rose Pacifica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Ah? This book? No... I just decided to have a look at it, that's all. There's no reason to have a deep interest in the origins of witches, is there?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: From now on, I shall entrust my future to you.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Do you think this is enough?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Blood Witch Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Feel the pain in my blood. Feel the anger of a witch subjected to contempt and oppression. Crux condemned me just because of my hazy visions of the future!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Do you think this is enough?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Outcast Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [... Please, don't abandon me. I'm still your little sister after all, aren't I? Don't throw me out like this... Don't look at me with that face!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Do you think this is enough?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Picnic Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sometimes, I just want to breathe the fresh outside air. How is it, Cinia? Doesn't the wind feel good?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Do you think this is enough?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sister, I only want to show this to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia anymore...]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: You should have been more careful.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Do you think this is enough?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I just need to stay still in this dress, right? I'm hungry, Vernika.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Sorry... I didn't have enough time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't care for white, but this dress isn't bad... Oh, no! Of course it was a good idea, Linia.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I don't want to do this!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Talk to me later. I'm busy right now.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Shouldn't I be appreciated for all I've done?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Oh, this... This is incredible. I never imagined that I would wear anything like this in my life.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: From now on, I shall entrust my future to you.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry. I'm a little busy at the moment.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sometimes, when I compare these with my drab clothes, I think gorgeous dresses aren't too bad. How do I look, Vernika? ... Never mind. I can't expect a decent answer from you right now...]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Wearing a wedding dress is just like a dream. Cinia, please give my thanks to Linia.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Laevateinn
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [How do you like it? As long as it's in your dreams, I can do anything for you. I can be anything for you. The girl you have a one-sided crush on, the woman of your dreams... You just need to sleep to have her in bed with you.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I don't like it too fast.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: I want everything to be done just right. No more, no less.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: This is all thanks to you.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sisters Sion & Rion
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sage Lady, are you going to play with me? Can I hug you? I like you! I don't need to play with a shadow, right? Hug me!] [A sun-blocking artifact. Where did you... First hug me!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: This might hurt a little, okay?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Is this what failure feels like?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Head Knight Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Being the head knight is a massive responsibility. I must ensure that everything goes according to plan, so I operate under a lot of stress. Sometimes, I feel like I need to take a break.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_F2_DOWN: Thank you, but I don't really want this.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Resting Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Luthica, you should relax. It's too early to get dressed like that now. I feel pressured just by watching you.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Adept Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Our attempt to make a sword from talentium was a success! We drew out this girl's potential perfectly. Now that we know talentium is capable of awakening these powers, there is no longer any reason for us to hesitate. - Creuset's Lab Notes]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: This won't work out, will it?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The sea is so quiet. It's been a while since you've been to the beach, right, Luthica? We're here on a mission, but since we had the chance to come to a place like this, we might as well enjoy it... Hey. Don't stare at me like that!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sword Planter Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I saw the head knight battle monsters on the Empire's border! She was amazing. The sword in Jaina's hand started duplicating itself, and every sword moved as if it had a will of its own. These infinite swords... are Jaina's power.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This dress is a little different than I expected. Is this what you like? It's not too bad. You're always full of good ideas, Linia.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'm a little busy right now.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sigma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [If anyone knows anything at all about Crux Guardian Sigma, it's that she's a drunk. It's because of that drunk that Crux has such a thriving wine industry. - Esprit's Memo]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Wait a minute. Let's have another shot!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [On a rainy day, the child was found in an alley. A puppy was playing with her bread as she stared at it blankly.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Ahem! Are you ignoring me because of my age? Your attitude angers me. Show some respect!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I should be paid for my work, shouldn't I?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [When Luthica first joined the knights, she was always guarded and wary of others. She even woke up when she heard a stranger's footsteps.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Give me a little more time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Iri

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Sita

CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Sorry... I didn't have enough time.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: ... I did a good job, right?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [How quaint! This is quite different from the mansion's bathrooms. Excellent. I didn't come in vain.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Shouldn't I be appreciated for all I've done?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [D-Don't stare at me like that... It's embarrassing.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Crux Knight Luthica, at your service.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Please give me a little more time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The times I spent with my mother in this hot spring made me so happy. I wish I could go back to those days...]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Face the power of my magic!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We'll see what comes of this.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Don't talk to me. I'm busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Miracle Panda Panica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm only going to go with you for a little while! It's not because I like you or anything! I'm only moving in because I have to!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: Hee hee. How do you like this?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Mommy, can you take me to the library? I'm done with all the books we have at home! I can even count out how many books we have! It's 103,000, right?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I'm sorry... This is all I have...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I... I'll be a good girl. I want to be a good sister for Cinia... I'll try my best.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Mister, why are you being so nice to me? Oh, the ice cream was great, thanks! What's your name? Creu...set? That's a weird name. Wow! Your amulet is amazing.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I just need to win, right?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I've got other things to do.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Ginger
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Live every moment like it's the climax!] [Cli... max?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Laevateinn
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is what you're into? Interesting. Your tastes are suspect, but that doesn't matter. The "game" the man mentioned is about to begin.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Sigma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It... looks like I lost control when I tried to become younger.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Layna Scentriver
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Come over here. If you are avoiding me just because I have been demanding, I will be very upset.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chief Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sorry. I'm not interested. What? That was one of Linia's maids? What did she say about me? Tell me!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: New Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Do some special training with me! Follow me. I'll lead you to a secret training ground.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I didn't train enough! I'll work harder.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Nytitch
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Long time no see! Did you have a good sleep? You go out every night, so I'm always lonely. Play with me!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Alchemist Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Hello! Let me introduce my friends. When I feel lonely and bored, I just make a friend. See? Now I have enough companions to start on my journey!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry. I was a little busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Street Idol Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We can do anything if we do it together~♪ Someday, we'll meet~ Something changes and something begins~♬ With every new day~ Let's give a big thanks to my homunculus!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Assistant Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to get Luthica out of there... There has to be some way. She's the first friend I made when I came here; I can't just abandon her.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: If you look at the sanctuary gates...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Luthica! How do I look? Isn't this cute? For an idol like me, being this cute is a piece of cake!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Let me change my outfit, at least.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the stage dress for my next performance. Luthica? Hey! Listen to me!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This dress was a payment from that wedding ceremony. It suits me, doesn't it? I want to show it to you, Luthica. You're the first girl I ever really liked.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I told you, I'm not a miner!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lig Nijes
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Bring me more. Blood. I only drink pure blood. Stay at my side forever. First, a little service. Dress me.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: How could you ask me to do this?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Nold
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What? You want to help? I can survive this on my own.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Yellow is a symbol of dignity, isn't it? Then why doesn't this dress feel dignified at all?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I'll beat you into the ground!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: How could you ask me to do this?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: This is how you do it.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You said Nold did it like that? Well, I won't lose this game!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Panica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't look at me like that! I only look like this because I'm low on magic!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: You expect me to work with my hands?!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Bedroom Nold
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What was so important that you had to come here at this hour? I'm tired. What drove you to barge into my bedroom?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Bunny Girl Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [How is this?! What do you think of my true form?] [Liar...] [Hey!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: How could you do this to me?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: This is more than you deserve.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rain-Soaked Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Eugh... The rain just keeps coming down. Stop staring like that. It's not going to somehow make my clothes dry faster!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Why don't you do this yourself?!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Who do you think I am?!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Plastered Sigma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What? Something fell down my shirt? I don't see anything. People in Crux have to be honest.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Whoa. Are there two of you?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: I told you I wasn't drunk!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: Do I have to do more?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Anj Inyghem
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [That artificial copy of me was a mere child? Of course it was nothing like me. Hm? You're the new master? Then I am at your service.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Ugh... Get me out of here.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Newbie Guide Rico
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's good to rest when you're tired, but don't forget the enthusiasm you had when you started.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I deserve a pat on the head.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimsuit Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I can't actually swim. Water just feels good.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: ... I did a good job, right?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimsuit Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I need some time to clear my mind, but not even watching the sea can calm my heart.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I could use a quick break.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimsuit Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The Federation's oceans are so beautiful, and I really love this swimsuit. I've always wanted to try a cute swimsuit like this.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Sorry, but I'm a little busy at the moment.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Please give me a little more time.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I hope this brings you joy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimsuit Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I can't stand salt water, but if the water is clean, I can swim freely.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Face the power of my magic!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I think I'm catching a cold.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: You told me to do this, and you...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Linking Shaman Nexia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We can't see what lies above the clouds. This world truly is full of mystery.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: This is the power of miracles!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Be satisfied and you will be happy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Vita Principal Treanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I feel so much better after taking off that hot costume. Huh? Is this the first time you've seen me like this, Miss Asmis? If you're curious about something, just ask. I'll tell you anything I know.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dean Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The festival is coming soon, but don't get nervous. You'll make mistakes. Stay calm and think things through before you act.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: A stitch in time saves nine!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [How is it? It's a little tight, but that's okay.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: A stitch in time saves nine!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Isn't this swim outfit a little small? Draw faster! You never said this was going to be a huge event with tons of galleries!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: A stitch in time saves nine!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Waitress Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You said you needed help because things were going to be so busy, but why didn't you say I'd have to wear this?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Is that all for you today?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: A stitch in time saves nine!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Persuasive Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Your fellow students are in danger! They need your help! Lend your aid to Vernika and Sita!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: A stitch in time saves nine!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Thank you... I will never forget what you've done for me. This year's festival will be a day I never forget.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: A stitch in time saves nine!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Calm Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Can I eat this stuff on top, too? These sticks are hard to use...]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: Just give me one rice cake.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Did I do a good job? Give me a rice cake.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Calm Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's red, just like I asked for. Excellent. You said someone named Ophelia is responsible for these? That name is unknown to me, but at the very least, you can send her my gratitude.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I'm only doing this for you.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: I really don't care for this.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Calm Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I've decided to stay here for a while. You said your name was Ophelia? Nice to meet you.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Calm Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [These clothes feel wonderful. Ophelia, you said? I feel like I've seen these beads before somewhere... maybe?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Vernika Answer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm so lonely... Someone, please hold my hand. I have nothing to look forward to in these sunless nights. What's going to happen to me?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Waiting Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [From that day forth, she would never speak without being spoken to. The girl without a smile turned down advice from her friends. Sita would learn from her own wounds.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Council President Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia became the chairman of the Royle Academy. Cinia ran for and won the presidency. She had an arrogant look to her as if this was only natural, but something was out of place.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I apologize if this does not suffice.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wanderer Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Luthica left with Clarice at her side. She believed it would be for a long time.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I've got something nice for you.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Conflicted Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The sage made her an offer. "I can make it so you can walk under the sun." Enrolling at Vita Public School, living in Esprit's office... Iri was torn.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Office Chief Esprit
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [1E! 2D! 3A! 4P! 5G!] [I'll chase you to the end of the galaxy! Just try and run! I'll chase you until your very souls sweat and bleed!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Council VP Tieria
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The student council need not worry. Everything is going just as planned. No matter what accident may occur, our plans will hold firm.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Who are you? Where am I?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Maid Lesnoa
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Maids don't just need a place to sleep and food to eat. They also need a place to relax... a place to rest.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: This is a human rights abuse!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: This isn't in my job description...
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I need a new line of work.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Odien
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Times are tough, but that won't stop us. The research of the Seekers will continue. Irene and I share this belief.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Failure is the mother of success!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lightning Palomporom
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [If someone is going to be called a queen, they'd better be dazzling. She calls herself a queen, but I beg to differ.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: What do you want me to do?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Ereshkigal
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I am Ereshkigal, ruler of the Netherworld. What, exactly, are you doing here?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: What did you want me to dig up?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Apostle L Red Sun
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Do not back down! It is your duty to bear witness to the hopes of the faithful! Cast away any thoughts of abandonment!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: There's no way I would lose.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I have something in common with that girl without memories: The loneliness of abandonment...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shaman Helena K Sink
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Put your faith in the small miracles that I show you. I will create a world where everyone is properly rewarded for their efforts.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Detective Asmis
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The wound on her head wouldn't heal, and sometimes, it would still bleed. She told Treanna that it seemed like some kind of curse.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I just have to find it.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Linus Falco
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The chairman is a strange person. Her eyes are dead. I heard her say something like "I had it right in my hands, but nothing happened..."]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Head Knight Eisenwane
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I know that you have nothing to do with the Empire! But I don't trust you! I don't trust you! Squawk!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: How was that? How was that?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [On a snowy day, Sita put on a Santa suit at the request of her friends. Sita, who hadn't touched something so cold in a long time, looked blankly out the window.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't care about that. This is merely an outfit that Linia made me wear.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [C- Clarice! This is too embarrassing!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The bell rang in that starry night as everyone exchanged gifts. This request was coming to an end.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: I'll finish before the bell rings.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Not bad for my first try.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Asmis
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I've double checked the list of everyone who is receiving presents. It looks like I have to deliver Sita's, first. I have to deliver the food and drinks before they go bad.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Linus
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Hmph! I won't like it at all if you don't put your heart into it. Give me your heart.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I messed up, so this is it.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The gifts for the other members are all ready. I don't know if they'll like them, though.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: If that's what your heart says, it's fine.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Helena
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The spirit of giving is the first step towards faith and unity. Here is my gift: My heart.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Dress Layna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Are you really okay with me? Even if you say that... I'll help you out. From now on... I will entrust myself to your care.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I don't think this is enough...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: GS 3rd Star
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: ["The twilight of Crux draws near. Small hopes will change everything. Get ready. Sister... No, 4th Star." As the light of the setting sun stretched across her glasses, her eyes glowed brighter. The color was so beautiful that I forgot where I was for a moment.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: Glory is yours for the taking!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: For the glory of the GS!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: It was just for a short time...
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: How can I be away from my sister...?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kar Vistas
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's not just about transforming with Musiciter's sword. From now on, we need to think earnestly about this problem. This is what we must do in order to erase sadness from the world.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: It's a bit of a shame.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Pool Queen Layna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Can you be quiet? I'm concentrating. What? Ah... This is a habit of mine. I can't concentrate unless I have something in my mouth. D-Do you think it's weird? I'm just a student!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I'll finish this in one move.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chaos Destroyer Seven
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [They are all expendable. Who can I trust? The enemy is within. Nobody will be able to stop me. This world will be destroyed!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: How could this happen to me?!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rosie's Sister Lucy
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Rosie is out at the moment; unlike me, she's a very active girl. If you have some time, would you like to play a game with me? I know a fun game. Heh heh...]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I'll only play for a little.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Fiery Cox
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Everything is progressing smoothly.] [The Empire's investigator, codename EMM386.EXE Cox, has begun investigating the Royle Academy under orders from above.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: My flames will never go out.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Icy Glacier
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [... No abnormalities to report.] [Along with Cox, codename HIMEM.SYS Glacier is heading for Crux to begin investigation of the Federation.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sita Vilosa
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm looking for my master's stuff... Have you seen it? Exam? I don't care about things like exams...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cinia Pacifica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Hahaha... Does anyone exist, other than myself, who can truly be called the perfect blend of wit and beauty?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I've been looking forward to this.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Oh look, magic. Do be careful now.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Was this outcome ever in doubt?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I refuse to acknowledge this insult!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Luthica Preventer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [For the pride of Crux, I will do my best. Please be prepared.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Crux Knight Luthica, at your service.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Iri Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What kind of person would make me an outcast just because my existence is different?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Face the power of my magic!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We'll see what comes of this.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: You get what you pay for.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Henlifei
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The simple act of standing before one such as myself grants pride and glory.] [The power that Henlifei wields makes her perfectly suited for the title of Leilang, "Lightning Wolf." - Rio's Memo]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Training isn't enough to beat me.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Let us never speak of this again.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chairman Linia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I just can't leave these girls alone. I want to protect them. I want them by my side.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: It's because everyone tried their hardest.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I hear the wind. It's not very pleasant... Where is Veltier?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I woke up to bright sunlight. Everything was a blur. Maybe it was the light? I toss and turn under the sun.] [Did you sleep well?] [A familiar voice called out, but there was nothing. Maybe I'm just hearing things.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [ I always feel like someone strange is watching me when I open my eyes in the morning. Her eyes are closed, and her feelings are hidden as she whispers. I wonder. "Those eyes... Whose are they?"]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [ I had a nightmare at the start of the day. I don't remember how I got here, but I always suffer in loneliness.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Morning Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The office is always noisy in the morning. Those two vampire kids never sleep. They're always causing a racket, and Esprit is always yelling at them. Their constant attempts to transform always ends with the sound of Esprit's slippers hitting them.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: I just want a good night's sleep.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 거인이 된 아이잉
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [으아아 이상한 초콜릿을 먹었츄! 몸이 갑자기 커져버렸츄!]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: 커지니깐 더 잘 나를 수 있츄!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wandering Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [She was born in nature. She was found in nature. Cannelle left Cinia's side to wander the forest, looking for the magical mushrooms that would change her small stature.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [In a shanty little town within Crux, a wind fierce blew over Jaina's head, who had just returned from shopping.] [It's been a while, former head knight. I have come to reveal the truth to you.] [The voice that was carried along the wind was that of Creuset.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: Were you expecting a little more?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 한복의 시타
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [위에있는 이 풀은 먹어도 되는거야? 이 막대기 쓰는거 어려워..]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 재색겸비 시니아퍼시피카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [재색겸비, 문무양립. 이말은 저 시니아 퍼시피카를 위해 있는 말이라 해도 과언이 아니죠.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: 이정도 했으면 뭐라고 해 줘야 하는거 아녜요?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 수영복의 루티카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [연합국의 바다는 참 아름답군요. 이 수영복, 정말 마음에 들어요! 이런 귀여운 느낌의 수영복도 입어보고 싶었답니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Layna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This a picture from my childhood. Where did you get this?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Witch Queen Linia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [So this is the place Cinia mentioned? It isn't bad, but it would be better if I came with Cinia.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Soak yourself in a hot bath.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Staff Sergeant Pintail
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sergeant Pintail has henceforth been promoted to staff sergeant.] [I don't like this at all. *sigh* Ugh.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: When can I finally be discharged?!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Fanatic Layna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The important thing is love. If these girls don't nurture their love, they would quickly lose their light.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Will you look at my collection?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Amrita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's been a long time, hasn't it? Anyway, where is Soma? We need to find Soma.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Master Vilosa
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sita's master, whose current whereabouts are unknown. They call her Master Vilosa.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Empress Pacifica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Your mother is looking forward to finding out the color of your future. A violet future is waiting for you.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: How can you treat me like this?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Flores Altheim
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Flores Altheim. Clarice's mother. She was summoned as a witness regarding Luthica Preventer's jailbreak. She had not been in contact with Clarice for a long time, so she joined Crux to see how her daughter was doing. She has zero value as a witness.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Ha... That was hard. I've had enough.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: First Blood
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [A pure-blooded vampire. In order to control her own power, she imprisoned herself and has since been sleeping for most of her life.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: This is how it will end.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: It was fun, being awake for a while.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: It's a good place to sleep...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Tea Time Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [A cup of coffee after waking up feels refreshing.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cooking Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [They said this is what cooks wear, but it's really strange.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Soma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What do you wish for? Tell me your deepest desires.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: I'll get more if you wish for it.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Asmis
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't usually wear clothes like these, so I'm a bit nervous. Does it look alright?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Linus
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Isn't it nice to go on walks like this sometimes?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I'm a little unaccustomed to it.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rising Sun Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [These are dango... This is takoyaki. They taste good.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rising Sun Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the first time I've worn clothes like these. I want to show this to Rose...]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: How could I do manual labor?!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rising Sun Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's a little hard to move around, but these clothes are pretty. Don't you think so?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: These clothes are a little tight.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rising Sun Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [People keep staring. Are these clothes strange? Am I strange?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Evil spirits, begone... Is that the phrase?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lunia Scentriver
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The wind is howling. Did something happen to Layna?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: What do I have to find?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Anj Inyghem
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [How nice. Swimming at the beach has a certain grace to it. It's a shame that there's nobody to enjoy it with.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: The beach is nice at night!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: It was fun. See you later.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Asmis
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Mommy said I shouldn't go with strangers who give me candy.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: Did I do a good job?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Linus
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It feels like something good will happen today.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Where are Linia and Cinia? Are they in the garden?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: I want to play with them...
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Do you know where they are?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Helena
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What's up, everyone? We have some good weather today. Wanna play?]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: I have to bring this back?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chief Celesti
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm a chief, but the higher ups don't take me seriously. A kidnapping? What a joke.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hero Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is my gift. My curse. Who am I? I'm hungry.]
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: Look out. Here comes Sita. Or a clone.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Here you are. No strings attached.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hero Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [A full suit of talentium can easily protect weak flesh. This is the latest in arcanotechnology. You would never be able to build this in a cave with a box of scraps.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I do not play well with others.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: You will fear and respect me.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF2: Why the rush? Is there a civil war?
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: I hope that concludes this arc.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF4: Much better than mere iron, is it not?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hero Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This outfit is embarrassing. Why did you make it so tight, Clarice?] [It's how the style works! You should be thankful. Where would Luthica be without Luthica's Pal, Clarice Altheim?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I have a resolve of steel.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: For truth, justice, and the Crux way!
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF1: This is a job for Luthica!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hero Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I am the dark! I am the knight! I am Iri! Now tell me. Where is Vernika!? WHERE IS SHE?!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I'm whatever Darklore needs me to be.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: The dark of night will return.
CHARACTER_CARD.FIND_SERIF3: It's good... But not good enough.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Asmis

CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Who's there? The brats playing these horrible pranks?] [Ooh, how scary! Ahahaha! This is an amusement park we built ourselves. If you're already this worked up, this is going to be so much fun!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Mirror Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't have the slightest desire to play with you, so just accept my proposal, okay? You should stop this right now. Can't you see how upset you've made Rio?] [Rio? Who's that? Oh... That lady with the huge chest.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shadow Nold
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I just gave that girl one look in the mirror, and I never thought she'd get so depressed.] [Was that mirror showing my past? Why did I do such a useless thing?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shadow Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sage Lady, what kind of girls do you want to play around with? You've got short hair, and you wear glasses. Maybe you like the same kind of girl~] [You girls need a lesson!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: You were teasing me, weren't you?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: I'll show you the difference between us!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: This is what makes me better than you!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shadow Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you know what you girls will look like when you grow up?] [We're already 200.] [Sorry...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shadow Ginger
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You little brats! Stay right there! I'm going to beat your faces in!] [Boring.] [Sage Lady, isn't there some more creative punishment? That's so cliche... If you want to come up with a better prank next time, you need to put some effort into it!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We'll see what happens next time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shadow Laevateinn
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Game over. Time to pay for your sins.] [Aah! You're scary, Sage Lady!] [I told you, my name is Esprit!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wind Gambler X
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a simple game. You just need to guess if the dice will roll odds or evens. Easy, right?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wind Girl X
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Eat everything and grow up fast, okay?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Drill Sgt. Pippin
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's important to get off to a good start! Don't slack off just because you're new!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Drill Sgt. Rena
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It isn't difficult. I'm just telling you how to protect someone.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: Hmph. I was taking it easy on you.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: New Medic Lina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone starts out like this. Your first try will end in failure, but you can always learn from it.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Clerk Cecilia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's best to watch what you say on government property. Everyone is recording every single word you say.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kenjutsu Karen
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Any military would love to have a solid weapon. Unfortunately, Sergeant Pintail doesn't seem to realize she's in a slump.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: Sometimes, you need to be tough.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Sometimes, you need to be gentle.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Strategist Elly
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The military might of Crux depends on its knights. In a situation like this, I don't think it's a good idea to divide our forces.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I'll end this before I count to 10.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sr. Knight Marian
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Attention! A hundred laps around the training grounds! Anyone who wishes to express a different opinion must first outperform me!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Drillmaster Pippin
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's important to get off to a good start! Don't slack off just because you're new!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Drillmaster Rena
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It isn't difficult. I'm just telling you how to protect someone.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: Hmph. I was taking it easy on you.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Medic Lina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone starts out like this. Your first try will end in failure, but you can always learn from it.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Head Clerk Cecilia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's best to watch what you say on government property. Everyone is recording every single word you say.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swordmaster Karen
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Any military would love to have a solid weapon. Unfortunately, Sergeant Pintail doesn't seem to realize she's in a slump.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: Sometimes, you need to be tough.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Sometimes, you need to be gentle.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Warmaster Elly
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The military might of Crux depends on its knights. In a situation like this, I don't think it's a good idea to divide our forces.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I'll end this before I count to 10.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: General Marian
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Attention! A hundred laps around the training grounds! Anyone who wishes to express a different opinion must first outperform me!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: New Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [A break is still a part of training. I should try my hardest at everything, right senpai?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chief Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We need a break. Having some more vacation days would be wonderful.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Frett
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you think this bamboo would make a great material for a flag pole? If the bamboo is processed properly, the pole will be lighter and stronger.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: It's a pleasure to meet you!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Mop Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We need new materials for the mops. Our current equipment is too heavy, so it would be nice if they were made of something lighter...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Layna Scentriver
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Are you shocked because my attitude has changed? Even I need a place to relax.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Accident Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I dropped another cup today. Miss Linia won't blame me, but I still feel bad about it.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kitchen Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Miss Linia doesn't seem interested in eating. This is worrying.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Today is going to be busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cleaning Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia will blame me if I don't clean properly, but she hates it when I touch her stuff. I'm not sure what I should do.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Tea Time Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Is something wrong? I'm having a cup of tea on my break. That's okay, isn't it?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Linia's Head Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [In this place, the most important thing to consider is Miss Linia's mood.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Disaster Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Today, I dropped a cup again like usual. Linia spoke to me in private, and I...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Gourmet Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The food we make is mostly eaten by us maids, but every once in a while, Miss Linia comes by to eat it, then compliment us. Those are our happiest moments.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Today is going to be busy.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Head Cleaning Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Now I get it. I can just try to clean and make it look like I didn't touch anything.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Tea Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Oh, sorry... I didn't realize this belonged to Miss Linia.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Head Maid Lise
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Wh-who touched Miss Linia's teacup?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Chief Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia's maids have such an easy life. I wish I were working for her.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Mop Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [But... I heard that over there, they have to use their hands to clean the floor... How horrible...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Merlot
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You won't take our land!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Chardonnay
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You aren't getting through!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Sangiovese
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It isn't easy to abandon our home, but we have to go.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Viognier
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I knew Crux was powerful, but this was more than I expected. No matter. We won't give our land without a fight.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Shiraz
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We have no other choice. We have to fight to protect ourselves.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: There's no choice but to fight.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Pinot Noir
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm tired. Why don't we rest for a bit? Here's some blood from a Crux human I caught.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Let's take some time off and relax.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Moonlight Vampire
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Look...The world of night is filled with the corrupt.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: This place is filled with corruption.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: This place is filled with blood.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Merlot
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Leave! Your goddess cannot travel into the night.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Chardonnay
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Your goddess can't pass through this place. Your light shines too brightly, so disappear.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Sangiovese
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The Crux Knights are here! I'm out!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Viognier
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's better to throw something away than have it stolen. I'm out of here.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Shiraz
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I will protect our home until the very end. If you're going to leave, then leave now.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: There's no choice but to fight.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Pinot Noir
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I won't move until I've taken blood from every one of you. This is our land.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Take some time off and relax.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: R. Moonlight Vamp.
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Look... Our thirst will be quenched with the blood of the corrupt.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: This place is filled with corruption.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: This place is filled with blood.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Panica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Who are you? I like people who give me yummy bamboo, so give me some. If you do, I'll go with you.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Ginger
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Climax... I don't get it. Do you?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Nold
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I like the people of the Royle Kingdom. I like the children who will grow up to become the country's future. I will protect them.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Stronger. More dignified. I need the power to rule over everyone here, if I'm to be the leader of the Wind Clan.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I'll beat you into the ground!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The world of books is full of mystery. How much more mysterious is the real world?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't know what the future holds, but I want' to be someone really cool. Maybe like that girl over there?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I just need to win, right?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Hey! Hey! I have a new sister! Her name is Cinia. I want to go see her right now and become a good sister for her.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Defender
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You came all the way here... Impressive. You must have a strong will. How do you feel? Tired? You can rest... It's okay.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I'll take it easy on you.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: I should have been more accommodating.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [That N... Nold. She'd rather spend time with humans than me? Humans are so boring! Augh! She's stupid!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: What did you think would happen?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Laevateinn
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I tempt humans, but I also rely on them to live. What are humans, exactly?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Sigma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Huh? Alcohol? Gross! Humans drink stuff like that? Weird.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Embracing Shaman
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a world where humans and non-humans can coexist. There is no need to distinguish between them. Now, where is your will?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I'll take it easy on you.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: I should have been more accommodating.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sleep Club Advisor
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Every day, I have to force myself to wake up and live. Opening my eyes is routine and breathing is routine and living is routine and I'm forgetting everything.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Angry Lady
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Who's the student who beat Seven?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Geography Teacher
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I go where no man has gone before, and everywhere I travel will become a new path.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Advisor
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The most important thing in cooking is your heart. Never forget that.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Health Teacher
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You're responsible for your own health, so pay extra special attention in class...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Night Teacher
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [In those sleepless nights, I wanted to do something fun. That's why I volunteered. The nights are long.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lady Philia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I heard about you from Seven. You're supposed to be so great? This is a battle of physical strength!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hannah Pathfinder
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I never look back, so watch my back for me.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Anyte Einoth
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Cooking isn't just about eating delicious food, but also cleaning up! Clean the kitchen properly before you leave!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Teacher Riano
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [To live a healthy life, be prepared for anything. Better safe than sorry. ♡]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rui Flett
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [If I could just close my eyes and have the time fly by, I'd jump and shout with joy.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Night Teacher Rui
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is different from teaching. The best part is that I don't need to take care of anyone. The principal knows me well.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sita Vilosa
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'll protect you, Vernika. Don't leave me, Vernika.] [She spoke, but there was no response. It was a phenomenon belonging to the closed structure of the vivid world. - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cinia Pacifica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I hate everything. I can't trust anyone.] [Defense mechanisms were installed to eliminate intruders. She could not speak, but she noticed me and attacked. - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Luthica Preventer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [They betrayed me...] [No connection was detected between these girls and the original world. Their existences are only fragmented reflections. - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Iri Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika... Come back.] [No special link was detected, so I initiated destruction protocols. - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Treanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What is this creature...? - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Panica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Was this the result of the chaotic phenomena in the vivid world? - DTD]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: Strike while the iron is hot.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sigma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Seeing creatures like these stunned me. - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Aka Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [... I didn't even know what to say. - DTD]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 3rd Witness DTD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Attention! This is a warning! This world is in violation of Spacetime Police law. It must be destroyed.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: World Destroyer DTD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This world is full of sorrow. We would prefer not to harm the world's creator, but there is no other way.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Winged Seeker
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Boring... Nothing is happening here, so this place is boring too.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Nytitch
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The SUN! The SUMMER! The SEA!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Strategist Elly
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [When I look at the ocean, my heart feels refreshed.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I'll end this before I count to 10.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Head Cleaning Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone has times when they just can't stand their normal day to day life.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Pinot Noir
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm taking a break. It's important to rest, no matter how you do it.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Let's take some time off and relax.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Night Teacher
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The dark of night hides the truth; history is made in the night.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kana.DTD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It has yet to be determined what kind of influence this has, so for now, I am suspending operations.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Mop Maid
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Did you wait long? I prepared a cold drink for you.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Embracing Shaman
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The warm sunlight feels like it embraces everything.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: I should have been more accommodating.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rio
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Ereshkigal knows everything. Find her, and you find your answer.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Nanai
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I want to discover the rules of how the world works. They're close to the world's point of origin, the place where everything began. Isn't this exciting?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Seven
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's fine if you win. IF you win. I don't care who Nanai is or what she's looking for. She's obsessed.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: New Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's time to use the sword my master left for me. I knew from the start that there would be no turning back.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Origin Disciple
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The past and the present are one, now and forever. Welcome to Muspelheim!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sion Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You call, and I arrive! Ta-daaaah! The two of us that make one detective have made our entrance! This case... smells hard-boiled, doesn't it?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: Say hi to Rion for me.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rion Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What do you need? This city's so crowded it's making me dizzy.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Frett
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I was searching in the forest for new flag pole materials when I ended up here. What is this place?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Odien
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Did you see any artifacts? This place is an amazing discovery. New materials, new ideas... Everything is new!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lyrica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Hiii! Are you having any trouble? I'm having a hard time figuring this place out too!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Six
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The most important tool for manipulating the public is information. Start with the information they've already heard, then work on the information you give them.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Isena
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You have to inspire dreams within the weary.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Euler
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [In the end, money makes the world go round. It must be ours.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Info Manager Six
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We'll get what we want. Don't you worry.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Obsessed Isena
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It was a success. We're making progress.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Item Manager Euler
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The hearts of the people are complex. We must protect their faith.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sarah
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I like quiet suburbs, but why is it always night in this city? It's a mystery.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Ack! Stop that! It's going to spill! You stupid pigeons!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Messenger Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I can deliver news from anywhere you want! This place has devices that let you speak to other people from far away, though.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: GS 1st Star
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This place doesn't suit our goals. We need an uninhabited location.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I'm going to take you for a ride.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kana.DTD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Ereshkigal rules this place, and there are a lot of complaints landing on her desk. You'd better take care of yourself.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lotte
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This place has so many new books just waiting to be read! It's amazing!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Conundrum
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Life is a series of problems, just like a quiz show. Isn't it exciting?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Vanguard Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Always take the lead. Hesitation dulls the blade.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Serie
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [New materials, new perspectives, new sentences. I can't miss out on a single thing. I don't get all the details, but I'm completely absorbed.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Envy Lady
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [... Destroy me. If my life is the price that has to be paid to console every lonely person in the world, I'll pay it gladly.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: Couples can die in a fire!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sleep Club Pres.
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm sleepy.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Fourteen
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [My personal rule is to finish every job, but I forgot.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I've got a job to finish.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Maid Luna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Lots of maids means a lot of laundry. The maids' laundry outweighs the master's. Who will be our maid... ?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Youngest Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I've never missed a day of training, and I never will! Someday, my dedication will pay off.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chirushi
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the return of the Elemental Lord of Wind! Hot Winds! Hurricane!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lagerfeld
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to continue my research. For a looooong time.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Winfield
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm Winfield, from the Council Press. Today, I'll be shooting some outdoor photos.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Kris Flina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Conundrum? Don't get too excited. Watch out for the light.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Do you see the difference between us?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Natura
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Mister Louver? What kind of place is the Federation?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Ignis
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [We received news of Mr. Louver's poor results.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cherum
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [It's okay, Louver. There are wings hidden here? It would be convenient if you could fly... UFO?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: You won't be able to touch me.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Do you see the difference between us?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Axis Wing Natura
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I see something down below. Is that midget the new head of the Crux knights?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Axis Wing Ignis
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Natura. Don't say that so calmly. The midget isn't getting angry.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Axis Wing Cherum
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [These ruins are now the property of the Empire. We will do as we please. Where is the key?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: Do you see the difference between our power?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Amethystar
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I found what I've been looking for. There's nothing more exciting than travel. My curiosity has been piqued. Even if it rains...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Zislana
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Where am I? Who am I? I have no idea which way is which...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Magision
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The time is different... Time flows differently here than it does in the real world.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Jaina Preventer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This sword... It feels like it possesses mystical powers.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Disciple Johanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [To be honest, it's impossible to explain with words alone...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Disciple Josefina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [... Stationmaster? Where did she go?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Fulle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What's up? Are you a knight? Ah... The stationmaster? Who's that?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chenin Blanc
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Interesting... This place isn't bad. Since I've been here, nobody has called us freaks or anything. Shall we stick around for a while?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Disc. of Abundance
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Cooking is living! Cooking is being! I will do my best to bring the stationmaster the best food possible!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Disc. of Eminence
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The culprit... is you.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Disciple Shur
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Please wait. The stationmaster will be arriving shortly.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Clerk
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Please take this receipt and send your request to the address printed there.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Intimidator
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you remember what kind of person it was that you met? It seems like an acquaintance.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Twenty
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an assignment for the red mansion. Infiltrate as a maid.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Spy
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I am protecting a client while disguised as a teacher.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Agent
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [An ice user. At a client's request, she froze over a certain room in Vita Public School.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Clerk Jasmine
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't take two numbers! Don't cut in line either! When your number is called, you come in! This isn't a bank, miss!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Casey
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [No matter who I meet or how new the work is, I can always do it.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Infiltrator Twenty
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This mansion is strange. Something is different. Just who are the people who live here?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Spy Forty
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [During my time as a teacher, I've discovered a talent for teaching.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Agent Ice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The client has anonymity. Because of this request, a student at Vita Public School, Miss Weekly, was hurt.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Proctor Margaret
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [In order to use talentium effectively, you need a flexible mind.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Proctor Coy
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Talentium Adepts can't get lazy in their training.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Proctor Iris
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Concentrate. You need to concentrate to control talentium.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Proctor R. Margaret
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Can you follow my moves? They follow specific rules.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Proctor P. Coy
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Push your power to its limits, and I'll measure it.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Proctor G. Iris
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You can be trained to focus. It's important to never lose faith.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Henlifei
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Your opponent is now none other than my esteemed self. Be grateful for this honor. You face the divine might of Lightning Wolf Henlifei.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Is this going to be fun?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: This is the power of the Lightning Wolf!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: Is this some kind of joke?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 갈색머리 츄파츄파족
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [최고의 재료로 최고의 물건을 만들어낸다츄!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 빨간머리 츄파츄파족
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [무사고 365일! 이제 1일 남았다츄! 으아아아아~]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 하얀머리 츄파츄파족
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [알겠츄! 다크의 생산라인을 화이트로 돌리겠츄!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 츄파츄파족 아이잉
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [품질관리는 기본이츄!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 츄파츄파족 파이잉
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [으아아아~ 넘어간다츄!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 츄파츄파족 보이잉
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [으아아아~ 1번 라인에서 백탁의 베이스가 범람츄! 큰일이츄!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Quickitty
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Meeew.] [The creatures known as cats have some kind of power to stir the instincts of girls. Particularly their paws... it's a powerful spell.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Council Rumi
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Please participate in the Student Council activities. It is mandatory.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: I'm Rumi, from the Student Council.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Council Press
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Capture complete! Now I've recorded everything!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Are you trying to steal from me?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Campus Delinquent
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Listen up. If you want to live peacefully, you won't get help from your surroundings. Why's that?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: What does it mean to be right or wrong?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Delinquent Leader
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I have no interest in those weaker than me, but if you touch my friends, it's a different story.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Latecomer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [She's late. Why are other people relaxing here!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: I wonder if I'll make it.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Prefect Layna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The Morals Committee must set a good example at all times. Because of that, it always lacks members.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Where did you find that picture?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Linia's Steward
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Lady Linia. How are you feeling today? I will prepare some warm tea for you.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: If you're going to be unreasonable...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Sita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I just need to stay still in this dress, right? I'm hungry, Vernika.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Luthica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Oh, this... This is incredible. I never imagined that I would wear anything like this in my life.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Iri
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sometimes, when I compare these with my drab clothes, I think gorgeous dresses aren't too bad. How do I look, Vernika? ... Never mind. I can't expect a decent answer from you right now...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Vernika
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Wearing a wedding dress is just like a dream. Cinia, please give my thanks to Linia.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Rose
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sister, I only want to show this to you. I don't want to show this look to Cinia anymore...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Jaina
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This dress is a little different than I expected. Is this what you like? It's not too bad. You're always full of good ideas, Linia.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Clarice
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This dress was a payment from that wedding ceremony. It suits me, doesn't it? I want to show it to you, Luthica. You're the first girl I ever really liked.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Rihanna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Thank you... I will never forget what you've done for me. This year's festival will be a day I never forget.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Layna
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Are you really okay with me? Even if you say that... I'll help you out. From now on... I will entrust myself to your care.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Linia's Tailor
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I designed some new clothes. Will you try them on?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Child Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Ahem! Are you ignoring me because of my age? Your attitude angers me. Show some respect!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I do not normally wear dresses like these, but if I was to attend your party, I suppose it could not be helped.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Chess Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Checkmate. Is that all you had? Ah... This opponent disappoints me. Not interesting at all. Isn't there anyone who can give me a challenge like my sister?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Swimwear Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is nothing compared to my own estate, but it isn't so bad. I can give you a pass.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Visitor Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [So this is a public school uniform? It's splendid! This is an excellent design for ordinary people...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Wedding Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't care for white, but this dress isn't bad... Oh, no! Of course it was a good idea, Linia.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [How quaint! This is quite different from the mansion's bathrooms. Excellent. I didn't come in vain.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Santa Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Christmas? A day where people exchange gifts? I don't care about that. This is just some clothes that Linia made me wear.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: President Cinia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia became the chairman of the Royle Academy. Cinia ran for and won the presidency. She had an arrogant look to her as if this was only natural, but something was out of place.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Fade
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm number 2? I resent that. I won't acknowledge someone like Falco. I'm number 1.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Who do you think I am?
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I won't give you a chance.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Palomporom
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [If someone is going to be called a queen, they'd better be dazzling. She calls herself a queen, but I beg to differ.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Jier
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Who are you guys? You can't just come and go from here as you please.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Jier Pris
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You think you can just force your way in? I'm calling the librarian.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: If you're going to force your way in...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Sia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm here to explore this place. If you don't have any business here, you need to leave.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sia Aka
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You got permission from the librarian? If you're not here to find a book, then what are you looking for?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Kanei
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I ended up really deep here looking for rare books. Do you know the way out?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I don't know the way either.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shawn Kanei
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Sometimes I lose my way, but I feel better with the librarian around, you know?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: I don't know the way either.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [If you're not an explorer, leave! This isn't a place that just anyone can enter.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Ritana
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Seems like warning you wasn't enough. I don't care who you are. I'll make you leave!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: If you won't listen to words...

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Tactician Knight
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Didn't you hear from the head knight? This place is under investigation by the Crux Knights.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: It's clear who will be the victor.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Tactician Bermin
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Anyone who isn't a knight should leave. If you refuse, I'll force you to leave.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What could the knights be looking for here? I have to find out.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Go to sleep for a bit.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Zislana
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't care if you're not a knight. You're in the way of my investigation.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Go to sleep for a bit.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: GS 5th Star
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [So the Crux Knights are here? Well, that's fine. It'll be fun.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Ahaha. It was too much for you.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: GS 5th Star
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Heheh. Ahaha. Could it be that I'm about to obtain that which that our great leader desires? Hm? Do we still have some little insects left?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Should I have some fun with you?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: RPD Constable
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I am Constable E-ROMA of the Royle Police. Your cooperation would be appreciated.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Constable E-ROMA
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The suspected kidnapper and the kidnapped child... Could this be the same person that A-GA is looking for? I need to investigate further.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: RPD Corporal
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I am Corporal Vedia of the Royle Police. Let's do this peacefully. Whatever it is you're hiding, take it out. Hurry up.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Corporal Vedia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This kidnapping incident comes out of nowhere, and now we're on a huge manhunt. What's going on?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: RPD Sergeant
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm Corporal... No, Sergeant Cisela of the Royle Police. I'm still not used to this rank... Anyway, your cooperation would be appreciated.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I have some questions for you.
