CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We have a crime in progress!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Sergeant Cisela
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What are E-ROMA and Vedia so curious about? If you just do as you're told, everything will be alright...]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: I have some questions for you.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We have a crime in progress!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 학생주임 리안나
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [축제가 가까워 졌다고 해서 성급하게 들뜬 마음으로 행동하면 안 돼요. 좀 더 침착하게 판단하는 자세를 기르시길 바랍니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 경위 케이
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [학교축제라고 방심할 순 없습니다. 오히려 이럴때 사건이 터지는 법이니까요]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 트리애나
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [축제에서 소년들의 열정이 느껴져요.][선생님 일부러 그러시는거죠?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 펭귄옷의 시타
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [시타 그 옷 귀여워!][시타 기여어!][펭귄옷 귀엽다~][으으..]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 비맞은 갓트
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [흐에에.. 웬 비가 이렇게 오는거야. 그, 그렇게 쳐다본다고 옷은 마르지 않아!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 바니걸 카넬
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [어떠냐! 이것이 내 진짜 모습이다!] [거짓말..] [야!!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 고주망태 시그마
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [응? 왜 그러나? 가슴에 뭘 넣었냐고? 아무런 조작도 없다네. 교국에 있는 자로서 항상 정직해야 하는 법이지.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 거리의 아이돌 클라리스
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [우린 뭐든 할 수 있어요! 함께한다면~ 꼭 만날거야~♪ 무언가가 바뀌고 시작해요~ 새로운 내일로~♬ 함께 노래해준 제 호문클루스. 호무에게 박수를!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 유학생 시니아
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [이, 이게 공립학교의 교복인가요? 제, 제법이군요! 서민들이 입는 제복치고는 괜찮은 디자인이라고 생각해요...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 실행위원 베르니카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [다들 열심히시네요, 그런 여러분들을 응원하는일도 제겐 큰 즐거움이랍니다]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 응원의 아이리
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [음? 체육대회라는거, 낮에하는건가? 유감스럽군… 모처럼 즐겁게 즐길 기회라고 생각했는데..]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 육상의 루티카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [맘이 풀릴때까지 달릴거에요! 기회가 있을때 마음껏 발산해야죠!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 웨이트리스 리안나
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [행사가 바쁘다고 해서 도와달라고만 했지, 이런 옷을 입힌다는 얘긴 없지 않았나요?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Maron
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'll catch your heart!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Maron
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the power of Musiciter?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Smartylane
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [This report contains all of my feelings!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: I'll give it everything I've got!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Smartylane
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Huh? I look younger? I was always young!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: I'll give it everything I've got!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Lucerrie
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I still need more power to protect my friends.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Lucerrie
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [With this power, I can protect my friends!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 학생회 주번 먼슬리
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [힘세고 강한 주번! 누구냐고 물으신다면 저는 칠링 브레인 먼슬리입니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 요리연구부 아이리
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [생크림은 되었고 그럼 이제…응?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 학생회 셀린
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [찻잎이 없으면 차를 마시면 되죠. 안그래요?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 학생회 방문자 이스프릿
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [아이리가 잘 지내고 있나 걱정되서 와봤더니 특별히 문제는 없어보이니 다행이야]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 프렛
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [병장님 깃발로 투창하시면 안되지 말입니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 카론
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [마! 무임승차는 30배 벌금인거 모르나, 미낙한티 김밥 사먹게 벌금내놔라!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 코넌드럼
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [아주 논리한 기분이에요!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 주번 더 레전드
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [학생회의 비밀스러운 수호자 주번 더 레전드입니다!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제 1목격자 카나DKD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [결국 죽으러 온건가? 아니면 죽는게 좋은건가? 아니면 죽음을 싫어하는건가? 결국 카나의 끝은 죽음이지만]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제 2목격자 카나DND
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [DKD의 말은 신경 쓸 필요 없고. 네 운명의 가치는 어느정도일까? 되도록이면 내 노력이 헛되지 않았으면 좋겠어]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제 3목격자 카나DTD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [너의 존재 자체가 이미 이 곳의 질서를 뒤트는 것이죠. 결론적으로 난 네가 별로 맘에 들지 않습니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제 4목격자 카나DDT
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [아쉽지만 이곳은 무의 세계. 모든 것이 0이기에, 저는 아직 무적은 아닙니다만, 그렇다고 제가 약하다는 뜻은 아니죠.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제 5목격자 카나DDD
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [모든 것을 관찰하는 이곳에 오신 걸 보아하니, 앞의 분들을 모두 정리하신 듯 싶군요… 곤란한 일이네요…]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 물의 라미아
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [내 아름다운 비늘에 홀릴 수도 있어]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 땅의 메두사
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [내 귀여운 뱀들을 너무 무서워하지 마. 내가 더 무서우니까.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 악마 캐리
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [하앙? 네 혼, 딸기맛 나는 거 같은데?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: G 라미아
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [끝없는 심해로, 나와 같이 가지 않겠어?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: G 메두사
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [나의 아름다움과 무서움, 이 모든 감정을 느낄 때 네가 돌이 되는거야.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: G 악마
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [네 혼, 나에게 준다면 널 꽤 괜찮은 녀석으로 바꿀 수 있는데…]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제이나 프리벤터
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [기사단 제일의 혼. 최선의 위치. 나 제이나에게 아직도 의심이 있나?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 시니아 퍼시피카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [언니의 걱정은 이해가 가지만, 지금은 어쩐지 언니가 말한 그거랑은 약간 다른거 같은데?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 로제 퍼시피카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [언니의 말도 일리가 있지만...]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 루에.K.아트엔드
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [당신들은 마더데몬을 위한 존재입니까? 아니면 방해하기 위한 존재입니까? 답에 따라 제 역할도 달라집니다~]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 도서부고문 에셀
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [책에는 마력이 있어요! 우리가 쓰는 마법과는 다르지만, 훨씬 아름다운 마법을 쓸 수 있답니다!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 숙명의 레이디 세븐
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [날씨가 좋네요. 제가 산책하기엔 더없이 좋은 날이에요.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 청십자회 플로렌스
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [저희도 슬슬 준비를 해야겠군요. 언제까지 뒤에서 조종만 할 순 없죠.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: GS 간부 빈츠
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [불길한 연기... 오랜만에 보는 봉화군요.작전을 중지하고 귀환준비를 해야겠군요.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Gold Lion Nold
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [You stand at a crossroads, traveler. What is your purpose?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Queen Cannelle
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Stupid humans! Let me show you the difference between us.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: I'll show you the difference between us!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Star Bird Gart
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Stars reveal the dreams of their watchers. My duty is to stand vigil over your dreams.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: This is the magic of dreams.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: This was a victory of faith.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Twilight Wolf Ginger
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you really think you can stand on the stage of destiny with that kind of ability? This isn't the climax yet!]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: We'll see what happens next time.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Flame Laevateinn
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Heh... I'm not interested in real fights, but since you already paid me, I'll do my best. So, who's the target?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Trickster Twins
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Entertain us! We want something more interesting! We'll give you one last chance! What's your final answer?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: This might hurt a little, ok?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Pegasus Sigma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I cannot let you act this way any longer. What do you want to know, Linia, eldest daughter of the Pacifica family?] [I have everything I need. I am merely waiting for the right time.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Cinia's Pet Panica
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Take me for a walk! Stupid human! Don't you know where I'm from?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Artificial Vampire
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Let's start the game. You'll hide. I'll seek. What's wrong? You're ruining the fun... Put some enthusiasm into it! Cry! Scream! ... die.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_FIRST: You still have a chance to run.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: True Vampire God
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't compare me to that pitiful imitation. Well, no matter. I'm just wondering about the taste of your blood.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Shining Form Nexia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Did you see... the past? The path you walked... The paths of your acquaintances... I will test your right to continue walking into the future!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Vita Principal
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Boys, be ambitious!] [This is a... girls' school.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Vernika's Sorrow
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I feel awful. Why am I unloved? I just want someone by my side. I'd give everything just to be with someone. I can't be saved from my loneliness.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Rio
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Your wishes will come true some day. Why not today?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Queen Ereshkigal
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Welcome to the Nether Train Station. The train will depart in 30 seconds.] [Have you seen a girl named Vernika?] [Vernika? I saw her; she didn't have a ticket, so she couldn't board.] [What?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Apostle L Red Sun
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Guard your faith. I will protect your faith. God will protect us.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: There's no way I would lose.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Eisenwane
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [The aloof head knight looks uncomfortable as she stands alone. The parrot on her shoulder speaks for her.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: How was that?! How was that?!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 2S Tracer Four
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Won't you play with me, Little Miss Detective? If you beat me, I'll tell you something. I know something you don't know.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Leilang Henlifei
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Not bad. Now play time is over. I will demonstrate to you why I am called the Lightning Wolf.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_SPELL: This is the power of the Lightning Wolf!
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_WIN: Was I too hard? I apologize.
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_LOSE: Not bad. Not bad at all.

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 이스펠트
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [저희 초콜릿 공장에 오신것을 환영해요 초면은 아니죠? 후훗 즐거운 시간 보내시길 바랍니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Magicat
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Meooow.] [The instant you thought of picking up the cat, its necklace began to glow.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Witch Queen Linia
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [What impertinence is this, coming here without my permission? Would you kindly disappear from my paradise?]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_GAME_START: Do I have to burn your fingers?

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Spirit Amrita
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Who knocks at the altar's door? The ritual requires a key.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Soma
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Amrita? Who are you? Did you awaken me? My name is... Soma. I am the key to the door.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Royle Police Chief
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm Chief Celesti of the Royle Police. I need your cooperation for my current task... What are you doing? Let's go already.]
CHARACTER_CARD.TALK_SELECT_CARD_FOLLOWER: What are you doing? Move it!

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 펭귄옷의 리안나
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [이 인형옷 정말 귀엽지 않나요?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Black Lion
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [One day, an evil force that nobody had ever seen before appeared. Everyone called it the Black Lion, and it somehow resembled Nold.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: Codename Q.B.
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [Welcome to Musiciter Land. However, the person you're looking for isn't here.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 배드민턴의 시타
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [이게 라켓이야…?][그래 시타. 이걸 들고 '폴짝' 뛰어서 저 공을 치면 돼][…꼭 폴짝 뛰어야 해…?]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 양궁의 시니아
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [바람이 좀 불어 빗나가지 않을까 내심 걱정했어요. 하지만 저 스스로에게 모든걸 맡기고 자신있게 쐈어요.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 유도의 루티카
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [한 판에 끝내겠습니다.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 탁구의 아이리
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [그 공. 내게 돌아온다.] [저, 저것은! "플리나 존"!!!]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 노숙자 카넬
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [이러지마, 난 단순히 불쌍한 노숙소녀일 뿐이라고]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 최후의 목격자 카나GLS
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [이곳은 마지막의 공간입니다. 곧 당신의 세계와 하나가 될 곳이지요. 물론 마지막은 마지막이 아닌 곳이지만, 저에게는 마지막이군요.]

CHARACTER_CARD.NAME: 제단의 수호자 노빅
CHARACTER_CARD.TEXT: [제단은 문을 열기 위한 곳이야. 단지 그것을 위한 존재일 뿐이지. 큰 의미를 두면 안돼.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Heartless Blow
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I don’t think Sita has an ounce of mercy in her. She’s just going to chop its head off while it’s staring her in the eye like it’s nothing. How can she be so cutthroat?] [... It's just a fish.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Student Orientation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Welcome to your new school, Sita!] [... Okay.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cooking Failure
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Another failure...] [How did you even make it explode like that?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ward Rupture
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [As soon as Sita touched the Scarlet Mage's ward, it shattered like glass.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: New Recipe
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone else can only make cookies... Well, I will cook something new!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shrink
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Did you ever feel like you had a headache because something was too big? What would happen if that something became smaller? Hm? Which thing? Oh, I was talking about you.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Balance
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Everything will lose meaning and become equal. You, me, and everything that exists.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Rumored Order
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [That's why the Federation issued a wanted poster for the Scarlet Mage! What do you think? Don't you think something exciting is going to happen, Sita?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Omnivore
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This isn't bad...] [Uh... That's supposed to be for animals.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Volcano
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Spicy!] [Oh, fantastic. I'm glad you liked it.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Accident
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Oh no! Cinia's favorite tea set!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: New Maid Training
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Your first task is to learn the layout of the building. Understood?] [Yes, senpai!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: She Did It
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I... I didn't do it! It was her! I swear by my master's name that she broke it!] [I'm your master...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Noble Sacrifice
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Who will bell the cat? To place Cinia's shoes upon her feet is an essential display of respect from her maids.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Tighten Security
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I have to ensure that Rose reaches the destination safe and sound. This must be a very important appointment.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Bondage
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Now I've got you! You'll never escape these chains!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Curse
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The basic principle of curses is to consider your opponent to be weaker than you. Miss Cinia has excellent talent with curses, since she considers everyone in the world to be beneath her.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Swap Spell
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The basic principle of fighting is understanding your strengths, as well as your enemy's. Huh? Weaknesses? Those don't matter. I just take the strengths anyway.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Mass Recall
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Let's go back. The tea and cookies are ready. Tea time!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Forced Entry
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [We saw the Scarlet Mage just as he got off the stairs. The entrance to the ruins lay just beyond. Everyone, including myself, was suddenly struck down. There was a flash of light and a crack of thunder, then only pain... We were helpless.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Saint's Blessing
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A warrior's determination must not waver! Strengthen your will!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Close Encounter
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The vampire called out from behind her. "Are you looking for the master of the Flinas? I can guide you if you want. Heh... Of course, I can't promise that I won't want a snack along the way!"]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Entry Denied
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What? Why can't we enter?] [New orders from Crux. No one is allowed to enter the country.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Healing Magic
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The basic principle of healing magic is to have a strong will. Picture something you want to protect, then cast the spell.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sky Surprise
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The unidentified falling object turned out to be a girl. Luthica looked for a magical necklace to explain how the girl could fly, but she did not find one.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Meadow Leisure
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [We're only able to relax and enjoy life thanks to the hard work of the knights. Never forget all the effort it took to win this peace.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Knight's Letter
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There is something strange about all these countries closing their borders. It's like someone trying to dam up every branch in a river... Please deliver this letter to the Empire immediately.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shield Break
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [My sword can't possibly be this blunt!] [Aah! Senpai! Our equipment!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sentry's Testimony
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Please, tell me... Exactly what kind of monster did the Scarlet Mage summon?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pacifism
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Still, it's best to have peace, isn't it?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Flina's Command
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Members of the Flina family, Master Luna Flina's words are absolute. Every sentence she utters carries as much power as a spell.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blood Reversal
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A reversal of blood flow... This is how we describe it. It's hard to fully explain, but it's a state of extreme fury.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Vampiric Rites
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What? What did you think vampiric rites looked like? I don't drink my blood like some kind of savage.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blood Target
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Please don't dismiss the drinking of blood as a crude act. We know the value of blood better than anyone else.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sacrifice
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There's no better sacrifice than this... This is a sacrifice worthy of a god... How does this sound? Would you like to have a try? To watch yourself drinking your own blood...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Full Moon Power
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [When the full moon rises, there will be perfect harmony between the moon and the power of darkness.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pass the Blood
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Heh... Would you like a drink?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Overwhelm
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Go screw yourself... Get out of my way. Stop dripping that disgusting rotten blood and just go away.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Forced Confinement
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Wasn't it decided that we would unite, since it's impossible to co-exist with the light? Why are you so scared of yourselves and the existence of others?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Evil Eye
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Everything will be drained... Everything this eye sees will die... It doesn't matter if it's friend or foe. It won't show mercy to anyone... Augh... Run!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Council Justice
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The heavens call! The earth cries out! The crowds roar... All calling on me to strike back against evil! Now listen up, delinquents! I'm the champion of justice! Student! Council! Inspector!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Student Council Kick
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [For justice! Student! Council! Kick!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Book Thief
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Hey! You need to actually check that out!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Tower of Books
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There are still so many books... I started working at the library to read books, not organize them...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Empowering Chant
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Sita! You can do this!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Feast
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika, Vernika... These... Can I eat them all?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Reunion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika... I'm back.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Unwilling Sacrifice
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Miss Cinia! Spare me!] [There is no cause for concern. I am merely turning you into a frog for a little while. I will change you back very soon.] [Nooo!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shoddy Magic
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Huh? What just... Wait... No!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lineage Maintenance
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [They were always worried about how to preserve their superior bloodline... And this was their solution. Unfortunately, the results were disastrous. No more sons would ever be born.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Magic Stone Found
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The magic stone of the Mother Demon has been discovered.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Magic Society Invite
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The Academy sent us an invitation to the Magic Society. Sita, Vernika, you girls are kind of famous. If you're interested, let's go together.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sister's Letter
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Foreword omitted. Dear Cinia Pacifica. How are you? I will be attending the Magic Society meeting as well.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dark Secret
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Rose...] [Could you not say anything else for now? I feel so sorry for hiding this from you, my precious sister... But please forgive me.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: No Turning Back
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Hold your swords! A Crux Knight is always ready for a glorious death!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sense of Belonging
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [At last! I finally became a Crux Knight!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Study of Miracles
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [At least you can drink some tea. It's too bad you always have to sit like that. How about going outside and getting some fresh air?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Proof of Miracles
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is something that can cut through the invisible link between cause and effect. Isn't this sickle the proof of the ancient visitors' victory?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Quick Service
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I just need to deliver this, right? It can't be late, right? Okay, got it, Miss Jaina! For the glory of the knights!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Mother Demon Rumor
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Welcome, my future friends! The mother of all darkness, the Mother Demon, is making her return. Aren't you interested? Why am I calling you a friend? You haven't died yet? Well, you'll all die someday.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Luthica's Ward
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'll use my power to create an opening! Take that opportunity and attack the monster with everything you've got!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Spell Change
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Hmm... It's a little tight around the chest... And loose around the waist...] [Okay, that's it! Give it back to me! Now!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Prank's Price
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Really... I told you not to drag me into your tasteless jokes!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Strega Blood
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Witches are born in the Witch Garden. Those who inherit the blood of witches have the potential to become witches themselves.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Strega Blade
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [In the end, what all we witches long for... is the same thing... A place full of sunshine where we can spend time together, with warm tea and a cool breeze... However...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Tower Visitor
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is the so-called Witch's Tower... It doesn't look like anything but a house.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Vampiric Education
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [As a host, I have an obligation to teach you how to become an elegant vampire.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Fatal Blow
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Be warned. Some day, you will pay for this.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Good Job
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Sita, we have to thank everyone for their hard work. Please repeat after me. Good job!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Thank You
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Cinia, please come closer! We can't both fit in the frame like this.] [Lu... Luthica, this is too close... Your che...st...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pleased to Meet You
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I don't expect you to understand why I went through the trouble to sneak in here to just to say this, but I'm... pleased to meet you...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cord Ball
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Your magic is channeled through your racket. Without your racket, your magic is useless, isn't it?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Troubleshooting
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You can count on me for things like this, but if you think I don't have anything better to do than help you, you're wrong. You're from the Academy? So in your dreams, you saw a place called Kana, and you want to know more about it. Kana... It's a mysterious place. I've heard about it too. Okay. I'll look into it immediately.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Court Jester
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I just need to use this racket to get the ball into the other side of the court, right? That rule may be set in stone, but I didn't hear anything in the rules about how I'm allowed to do it.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sage's Sermon
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You understand Rio, who acts like she knows everything, so why can't you understand a sage like me? There... are no words. Why don't you get it? Tell me the truth, Ophelia. Are you serious, Ophelia, or are you just making fun of me?!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shameless Ambition
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Okay, let's see... While you're just sitting there drinking tea... Heh...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Night's Beckoning
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Sita, come here... I can't bear this any longer... Be with me... I want to carve everything about me into those golden apples you have for eyes... Sounds delicious... I want to know everything about you, Sita... Give yourself to me.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Visitor
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The gate appeared, but it was a little different from the rifts that the monsters came through. Those other rifts opened hastily, but this one looked more proper. From the gate, a woman in white appeared. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Black Magic Plot
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The flash that pierces the heavens! Finally! With this power, I'll reclaim my freedom!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Unmasked Lie
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Th-That's a lie... It was Jaina? No way... I've got to calm down. I must have misunderstood.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Bargaining Table
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Don't be so unreasonable, Miss Cinia. Shouldn't you at least listen to our requests? If we don't work, you will be in trouble as well, Miss Cinia.] [Strike? Maids? I simply do not understand.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Maid Revolution
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Comply with legal working hours! Raise our salaries! Give us at least one day of paid time off per month!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Suicide Mission
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Put that fire out immediately!] [W-Wait... I never learned any extinguishing spells, Miss Cinia!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Linia's Tastes
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Sorry, Miss Linia... I'm always making mistakes.] [No problem. Things will be just fine. You can fix it later, but how about spending some time with me first? I miss having company.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Say No Evil
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Mind your manners. Don't give Cinia any more trouble.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Chrono Clock
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This clock-shaped artifact is a device used to communicate with headquarters. It's said that under certain circumstances, it has another function, but for the time being, no one has ever used it.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Power Control
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The director's ultimate artifact. It's more powerful than anything ever before. The ability to control that power is one of the director's greatest skills.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Undercover Work
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What if someone recognizes me? I'm so nervous... Jaina, please give me courage.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Conversion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Didn't you come here because you were looking for something, hero of Vita? I believe you can find the answer in Crux.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Recluse
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This joke went too far. Those girls need a lesson. Rio thought Crux would protect her, but they were sloppy and let those two little vampires through. I'm disappointed, Jaina.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Arrest
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You're under arrest for consorting with vampires and bringing harm to human beings.] [I can't believe this. Jaina!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Crux Command
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [No need to worry. Heretics will be expelled from this land. The decision has been made. Now go and assemble the knights. I will remove the witches and vampires with my own two hands.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dollmaster
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The dolls just keep coming... Aah! The strings are tangled again! Come on, help me out!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Bad Apple
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Which is tastier? This apple is for someone important, so it needs to be made with great care.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Midnight Doll Show
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [None of my dolls are failures. They're all facets of myself.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Misfortune
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [K-Kana... wasn’t just... a place.] [You have learned too much. Kana is something that must be guarded. Do not approach it so carelessly.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Alluring Whisper
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I understand you quite well. A marginalized existence. The warmth desired by an unwanted entity, and those emotions that can never be buried. Do not feel regret. You deserve that girl.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Impulse
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [In that moment, my mind went blank. Even though I had the strength to stand before the Elders, my will shattered. The only thing left of me was another self, driven by a terrible thirst and loneliness.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Vernika's World
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [When Vernika became a vampire, her magic surpassed the realm of reality and imagination. Images from the world within her heart began to spill over into reality. Vernika now absent-mindedly waits for Sita in the withered garden.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Uniform Tweak
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Our school uniforms just don't make any sense! Uniforms like these need to be redone!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Change
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [(555) 800-8135...! Change! Dress Up! Break the chains of destiny!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Over the Wall
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The whole world is waiting for me beyond this wall! I'll be back, Asmis!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Unionize
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Battles are always necessary to achieve goals, and I am up to the challenge! For the Pacifica family, this place will become a living hell!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Tea Time
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Are all the cookies ready? And the fruit? That fickle lady suddenly wanted us to go on a picnic... Ugh. Now this kitchen is a mess! After all this work is done, I'm going to need a cold drink.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Adjustment
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Hmm... Those goals you speak of are nonsense. I will adjust them for you.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Education Results
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'm no newbie, girl! No newbie!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Brilliant Brain
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This research never ends... Can anyone promise me that, after this, I can have a decent night's sleep?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Vivid World of Kana
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The vision, the land without lies, enthralls me. This is the place where I will find the truth.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: The Crescent Enigmas
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [... This is really hard to solve. Is this even possible?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Scardel Rite
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is the rite for becoming a real vampire. I have to endure this.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Final Answer
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This long-awaited final question has been the most difficult question for three generations of Crescents. Will Conundrum figure out the answer?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Seize
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I need that sword... I don't ever want to see Vernika like she is now!] [Sita?!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Medusa Glasses
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [These magic lenses, the Medusa Glasses, augment the user's visual perception greatly; They can even grab arrows out of the air with their bare hands.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Comparison
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I... I can't go back with these grades! Please give me another chance!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Breakdown
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [N-Nanai? Please stop hurting me like this... Please... *sob* My world is falling apart.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Spring Fever
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I need to make a campaign plan... I have to get elected... I can't sleep here... Zzz]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Absolute Control
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I just need a few tricks to tie up Celine's supporters.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: One Way Trip
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [As long as I know this, I can't pretend to know nothing. Be warned, Nanai.] [Whatever.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shift Change
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The best part of a work day is the end.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Rise
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [No way! Dress... Up... Rise!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Refreshments
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It's been a long time since Cinia came to visit! Make sure nothing goes wrong!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Obedience
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [D-Don't think I'm easy to win over! I'm only going to your house so I can conquer it... Whatever. Let's go.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Meteor Call
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Stars. Flame. The time has come for ruin to visit this land. Heavens... Fall!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Servant's Ward
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [In the name of maids everywhere, I will protect Miss Cinia with my life!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Doubt
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Big sister... What is the truth? Now... I can't trust anyone. Everything sickens me, even the blood in my veins.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Fast Forward
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The chrono clock's true power is to grant acceleration. This power, "Clock Up", allows its user's speed to exceed the limits of the human body for ten seconds.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cross Cut
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Those who can cut are those with the will to cut.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Planned Misfortune
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Linia, these days, I have been feeling strange. I feel that the decisions I make are not my own. Something is eating away at me, as if someone were emerging from inside my consciousness.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Azure Cross Meeting
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You think there's a new group of vigilantes trying to exterminate the night? How about you buy me another drink and I'll tell you more about it? Haha...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Escape
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Clarice! You're amazing! How did you break me out?] [There is nothing I cannot do! Everything I wish for becomes reality! I did a good job, right Luthica?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: False Delivery
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [These three swords were passed down generation to generation in the house of Pacifica. Cinia owns one of them. That sword has the power to change the past. What do you think? Even Jaina has never heard about this.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Comeback
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I loved this place... Crux. The weather is lovely again today. Jaina... No. This place is too good for her.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dark Meeting
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Today, I wish for all soldiers, as members of the great GS, to continue to battle with excellence!] [Yeah!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dark Convocation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Fall in! For world conquest! All hail our great leader! For squid and beer! For punch and pie!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pupil Becomes Master
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Now I understand... This is blood? Hee hee.. Looks delicious. It's sweet. Hahaha...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Agent Visit
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [When she does that work of hers, she always wears white. She thinks everything looks more beautiful when splattered with blood, such as that person lying on the ground over there. Look for Secret Service Agent Ten. That's me.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Ride
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Who are we? Two vampire detectives who have become one! Dress Up Ride! Tension Fortissimo!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Tranquility
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The reason why I remain neutral is to maintain the balance of power.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Night Conqueror
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Tell me where the head of the Flina family is. In the meantime, I'm taking all the blood you have to drink... Hee hee hee.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Summer Machine Gun
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The girls' first challenge. An album of their songs, filled with sincerity. Listen to it! Summer Machine Gun!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Detection
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Even speed like that can't escape the sight of the Medusa Glasses.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Golden Pair
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [We're the Golden Pair that will lead Vita to the nationals! Off to the nationals!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Fault
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Fault! Rhona's serve has failed! The nationals are coming down to this! This is a crisis for Rhona!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Infighting
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You're always like this, President! Everything has to go your way! You never listen to what we have to say!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Minds in Conflict
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Nanai!] [You don't deserve to be president, Celine. That position belongs to me.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Secret Art: Gale Flash
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Step aside. There's no time. Gotta get to Vernika... Gotta put you down to make it in time... Secret Art: Gale Flash!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Home Study
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Cinia, it is important to consider how others feel. How would you feel if you were in your servants' shoes?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Maid Experience
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Miss Cinia, please react more quickly!] [You... Do not expect to be forgiven tomorrow!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Defeat
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Everything has burned away into nothing...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Meeting Master
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [From today forth, I will be your master. Are you excited about our future together?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Comfort
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Ah, Cinia. Hold me...] [Fascinating. You call out for another girl even while you're in my arms?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Curse of Distrust
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I can't trust anyone anymore. If you want to live, get away from me.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: El Mundo
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There is nothing left to believe in. Hope is useless. People are useless. Everything is useless. Time Stop... Die.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Unity March
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [All for one and one for all! Our bond of faith grants us strength!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: A Single Flower
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I didn't know its name, but I had never seen such a beautiful flower.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Protective Chant
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The flash of a shield protects the will of the knights!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blossoming Skill
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Suddenly, one thought entered Pintail's mind. "... Breathe... Everything... has its own vibration."]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Degradation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This was the first time the side effects of talentium were seen. In Jaina's letter, she described talentium's true appearance. - Creuset's Experiment Notes]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pilgrimage of Proof
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: ["I need to find myself," said Sergeant Pintail. To find her own path, she took fourteen nights and fifteen days off. Her destination was H.K.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sword That Cleaves Evil
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There is no one in this land that I would consider an ally. Not anymore. Clarice, please stay by my side.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Doctor Play
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Where does it hurt? Hm... Here? Alright... Hah! How's that? Does it still hurt?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Tick Time
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The time has come for the balance of the night to be restructured. Who is the true master of night? We will ask the stars.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Maximum Drive
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You have two hours, thirty-seven minutes, and thirty-five seconds to resolve today's incident. Despair waits for you at the finish line.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Intrusion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [At the very moment when Conundrum chose her answer, a voice cried out. "Hold it!"]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Absolute Power
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Ah... So you're Iri's servant? Fascinating... Bring me your master. You are not worthy.] [Hahaha... A servant? Me? Don't be ridiculous. I'm the master here... Understand?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Misfit
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Cannelle was born in the wild. As a child of nature, she couldn't adjust to a life stuck in a mansion. "I want to go back..."]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lago de Cisnes
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A single slash that destroys the silence.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dream Conversation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Although Vernika dreamed of a day after everything was over, when everyone could smile and laugh together, her dream vanished.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Event Preparation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There's going to be such a huuuge crowd. Please follow your orders exactly! You girls will behave, right?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Victory Proclamation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'll finish this in the next seven serves. Long matches are bad for health.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Topsy Turvy
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The cooking contest would determine the direction of the club's festival event. Their techniques would be put to the test, with the winner deciding the menu.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Inhuman Creature
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [R...Roach!] [Stay still, Vernika.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Preserver of Rules
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The inspector loves peace, believes in friendship, and wishes to protect peoples' lives, so she stands against rule breakers as an extracurricular activity.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Morals Crackdown
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A human life is deeper than the ocean. A human's love is higher than the mountains. To those who don't understand this, look to tomorrow and see! Emergency! Target point 4 8 5! Geo Scud Launch, Go!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Encounter
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika. Why are you standing there like that?] [Sita... Come here.] [I'll bring the old Vernika back. I don't care what this magic sword takes from me, whether it's my eyes or my arms. It can take everything if I can save her.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pursuit of Perfection
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I will not tolerate even a single speck of dirt in my house.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Black Magic Preparation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The influence of the witches grows underground every day. Before long, the day when they march over the continent in the Witch Queen's name will come.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lady's Wrath
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What the... How?! How did this happen?!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shoot
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The lady spiked the ball into the opponent's court! She scores a point!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Servant of Clarice
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It's been a while, Master Clarice. I acquired every ingredient you requested. How is your next experiment going?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lady's Attendant
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Keep the skirt free of wrinkles. Make sure the lace doesn't flutter. Calmly maintaining a lady's appearance is an attendant's basic responsibility.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Push Forward
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There is no need to run around. I will go directly to Linia and ask her myself.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Supply Request
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'll have to do this later. Putting today's work off for tomorrow... If you procrastinate, it just snowballs out of control and the sleepless nights will continue.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Miscalculation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Why does this same mistake keep getting made? Our predecessors made the mistake, and now their replacements are making the same mistake! What will we do if the mistake just keeps getting passed down?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Passcode
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Oh, welcome. If you tell me the right number, I'll send you on your way.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Vacation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You always pick great places to go, Sergeant! This place is great!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Warrior's Resolve
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I will defend this land! I swear on my life!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Beach Research
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [There might be an artifact here! Give it your best and find out!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shock
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Who are you?] [I am the GS First Star, and I've come to unravel the lies of Crux's goddess.] [Lies?] [The goddess twists time and resorts to tricks. The land's time is out of alignment.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Crux Underground
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [GS is prepared. The moment their leader gives the order, they will move as one towards Crux. No one knows the underground labyrinth like they do.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Recruitment Ad
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Recruiting potential GS members! We have no interest in ordinary humans. If there are any skilled Talentium Adepts with the ambition to change the world with their own power, come join us. That is all!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Marionette
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You may make me move any way you wish. However, do not approach. Use your eyes only.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Mischief
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Th-this joke went too far!] [So what? It's just a joke.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Night is Coming
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Soldiers. Night comes! First Star will be the vanguard, and Colonel Z will command! All GS within the Federation will immediately head toward Crux.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Query
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What? Why do we drink blood? If we knew another way to refill our power, then we wouldn't have to, but we don't know any other way.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Showdown
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I am Jaina Preventer, leader of the Crux Knights. I am here to cleanse this land of abominations.] [... Step aside. I have to find Vernika.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Moldy Chocolate
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Material used to be used to craft Morning Characters. Now it's moldy and gross. Still, if the Morning Characters come back some day, it's worth hanging onto.] [Have you ever... received these? I have, but they didn't make me happy. Those twins are awful... Moldy chocolate is disgusting, and not even Sita will eat it. - Esprit's Complaint]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Hot Item
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Vita Public High School official merchandise. A cute keychain featuring the principal.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Principal's Story
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The visitor was a man in red. I don't know what "Kana" was, but he was looking for the same thing you were. He seemed anxious. He was also carrying another "key."]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Low Turnout
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The vote to impeach Celine happened to coincide with the festival, so there was a low voter turnout. Nanai missed out on the opportunity of a lifetime.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shattered Land
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Cinia's sword, when used, would consume part of the wielder's body, but it had the power to turn anything back to an earlier state. However, the full truth was that it would return whatever it hit to nothingness. When Sita realized this, she tried to stop, but it was too late. Everything around her had already been ruined.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Keepsake
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika was nowhere in the ruins of the buildings. Sita searched for a long time, but the all she could find were her glasses.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Everyday Discovery
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Practical advice. If furniture smells like varnish or desiccant, you can clean it with alcohol. The smell will be eliminated.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Negotiation Breakdown
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Is this some kind of joke? Forget it. Negotiations are over! I refuse to work here a moment longer!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Inevitable Choice
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [With her hatred, Cinia's power grew enormously. Finally, Linia made her decision. She took control of Cinia's mind.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Table Manners
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The noble ladies of the Royle Academy do not merely partake in academic education. They learn about how to properly conduct their behavior as befits their station.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Royle Academy
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The Royle Private Academy. A garden of ladies.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Crux Conference
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Even within Crux, opinions were greatly divided on the plan to deal with the Vampire Lands. However, Jaina's commitment was absolute.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Enemy Within
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It's what's on the inside that counts. You can't see something that's right under your nose.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Commissioned Research
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What do you want to know?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Supply Transfer
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is too heavy, senpai.] [This isn't the only burden I have to deal with...] [What was that?] [Nothing...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Relieve Post
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [To Jaina Preventer, leader of the Crux Knights. Your replacement will be arriving shortly. Enclosed are the proper documents to ensure a smooth transition.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Stakeout
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Isn't this exciting?] [It's a weird name, isn't it? Ninth Star?] [We don't know much about stuff on the outskirts of the Federation.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Heart Barrier
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Those two have a powerful love for each other that manifests as a type of barrier magic. This "Heart Barrier" is usually used by couples with an intense love for each other. Ugh. Love. I'm going to destroy those stupid fantasies! - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Flare
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The agent launched a flare. The red flare indicated that Crux had been devastated, but the objective was not found. The place the GS leader was looking for was not in Crux.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Crux in Flames
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [No witnesses. Burn everything.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Devastation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Iri fell to her knees before the shattered land. The strength left her legs, and the hole in her heart was filled with cold. The sudden loss of Vernika overwhelmed her.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ruin's End
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Someone has interfered with this world as well. Did DTD do this? This kind of destruction isn't DND's style either, but this is still worrisome.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Talentium Ingot
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Premium Material is obtained in the Shop and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Because purified talentium becomes harder after heating, it requires careful magical working. Talentium of higher quality possesses more spiritual power, which results in better craftsmanship. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Vernika's Nightmare
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [In her dreams, the beleaguered Vernika finally discovered herself. She was the cause of her own sorrow. When everything is said and done, people who can't do things can't, and people who can, can. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ominous Sky
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It felt as if the night sky within Vernika was growing darker.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: String of Emotion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The string of emotion. An artifact with two ends that are given to two different people. Each person feels the emotion they want the most. As the users reflect on their emotion, the enemy is influenced as well.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Fellowship
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I could never abandon my injured comrade! I refuse to leave this place without her at my side!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sita's Suit
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This suit actually makes Sita look like some kind of intellectual! Fashion Queen is going to be ours!] [I'm hungry, Vernika...] [Hang on just a little longer. You have to be a boy- Er, girl who can put up with hunger when style is on the line.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Perky Girl
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The artifact that Esprit found had amazing effects. It could reverse a person's personality. Sita, for example, became perky.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Halloween Minidevil
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Alright. Look over here! Good. Raise your eyes a little. Tres magnifique! Perfect! Let's go! Fashion Queen!] [Vernika, I wanna eat it! Hurry up.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cinia's Suit
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You even look great in a suit! You're exceeding all my expectations, Cinia.] [L-Linia... What are you talking about?] [We aren't far from winning Fashion Queen.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Diligent Girl
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Amazing. The artifact even has the power to make Cinia do manual labor. - Esprit's memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Halloween Countess
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Perfect! Okay... Now stick out your tongue like you're licking off some blood!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Luthica's Suit
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Just like I thought. Luthica's proportions are perfect. This should be good enough to compete. Fashion Queen...] [What?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: The Hazing
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Got a problem?] [Negative!] [Gather all my subordinates and all your superiors. Do you think I'm just playing around when I hit people? Do you think you get a free pass just because you're a sergeant, Pintail? - Witnessed by Esprit]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Halloween Witch
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Amazing. Just by adding a broom...] [Jaina?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Iri's Suit
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The lower buttons were left unbuttoned to give her a rough and unpolished beauty, while the curvy waistline showcases the figure of a woman. The exposure proclaims that she's tough, but at the same time, shows her feminine beauty. These contrasting elements come together like magic to create impeccable style.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Carefree Heart
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: ["Space is in your hands. Reach out and seize the universe! It's space time!" The first thing Iri did after she became immune to sunlight was to look up when the show about the masked rider would play.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Halloween Wolf
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Sage... why are you making me wear this?] [We're going to take the throne. We're going to win Fashion Queen.] [... huh?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Double Council Kick
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Love!] [Friendship!] [Double Student Council Kick!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Comfort Room
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This room was filled with an aroma to comfort maids tired after a long day of work. It seemed a bit strange. What exactly was that scent that Linia brought?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Flash Shield
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This shield of light would ensure that the Seekers' quest for knowledge could never be stopped.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Strega Think Tank
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Unlike vampires, who can't survive outside the world of night, witches choose to live in the normal world, albeit in its shadows. From time to time, witches gather to brainstorm methods of gathering money and information. This event is the Strega Think Tank.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Rio's Ward
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'll test you first. Try to break through my ward.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Origin Reader
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Looks like I can unlock some power too. Heh... The keyword is vital.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Awakened Lady
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Suddenly, strange visions Seven had never experienced flashed through her memory. "I see it!"]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Meltdown
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [With my master's teachings and my master's sword, I will melt your defenses!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Restored Origin
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is different from healing. It's restoration. It would be best described as restoring something to its original state.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sage's Slipper
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What do you think you're doing?!] [Sage Lady! Why are- Ow! Ow!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Third Impact
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The first failed. The second also failed. The third was a disaster as well. Every flag pole issued to her broke. By the time they had to march, she ran out of extras...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Arc Light
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is the righteous power of light!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Charming Aura
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Heeey honey. Wanna play? Just follow me.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Trap Book
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The energy of a curse attacked Nanai as she touched the book.] [Se... Seven?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Council Grand Opening

SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [We all came out to T // On the Lake Vita shoreline // To eat food at a mobile restaurant // We didn't have much time // But the other ladies // Were at the best hotel around // But some stupid with a lamp // Burned the place to the ground.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Limit Break
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Ceres! Eris! Sedna! Ready? With these three blades, my power becomes a million! You are not prepared to defeat me!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Relaxation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This place is as nice as I heard. Yes? This isn't the changing room?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Smallification
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The world looks so different from this height. How about it? Don't you want to experience it?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blu E Rosso
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I will unlock the future.] [All of the members felt a strange sensation. They felt a conviction that they had to follow Rose's orders.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Underground City
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It's amazing that a place like this exists underground, Kris.] [This place must be...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Divine Clue
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [How about I give you a reward? I will tell you about the God of Truth you have been looking for. Come closer.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Butterfly Brand
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Helena fell into a strange state.] [This is a trance. It's a state where you can communicate with your God of Truth.] [Butterfly tattoos appeared on Helena's body.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Eternal Witness
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You police seem to be displeased with something, coming to this world that I currently happen to be in... Crevasse is still here. It's a bit difficult right now. Please wait for a bit.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Welcome!
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Welcome! It's great to meet you all! Sita, why don't you say something to them?] [... Hi.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Disappearance
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A massive ventilation opening. She remembered something being in front of the opening, but that something was no longer there. She couldn't remember exactly what it was, but she was certain that it was gone.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Finding the Library
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'm looking for a book that tells about the history of this library.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Library Elusion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Why are we avoiding those weaklings? Shall I dispose of them for you?] [It's difficult right now. Wait a little longer.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Surprise Attack
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Seron found something strange in the Pacifica's basement storage. This golden hammer glowed brilliantly, as if everything it touched would be turned into light.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cosmo Drive
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Is this... a dagger like the one Lucerrie has? If so... Oh? What's this belt?] [Triforce! Ready?] [Did... the dagger react?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Strega in Exile
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I saw a witch in the underground library. Her long, dark hair fluttered behind her, and she held the hand of a small girl as she ran. From behind, she looked familiar, according to the testimony of a Vita student.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Head Knight's Rest
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Eisenwane's personal life remains a secret. Only the parrot knows what kind of life the awkward girl lives.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Clairvoyance
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Wait! If you go that way... You mustn't meet her! Veltier!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Elusion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [V-Vernika-senpai?] [One page of the missing story unfolded before Veltier's eyes.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ritual of Unity
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [They hated the master, but the vampires agreed that until they reclaimed their lands, they would have to combine forces.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Mediation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Please bear in mind that we must first think about the safety of the whole family.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Intervention
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I will sacrifice myself for my comrades.] [The unity between the Aletheians and the GS is steadfast.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Panel Rise
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Book of Light, unfold! Field domain, expand! Panel access approved!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Friendship after the Rain
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Don't you know that the ground becomes more solid after the rain?] [But this place is all sandy. The rain would wash everything away.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Window Shopping
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [How is it, Iri? You don't like this one? Sita, stop eating and pick something out, too.] [I can't find a good time to talk...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Witchification Plans
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Linus confirmed Linia's plans with her own eyes.] [I can't sit around and do nothing...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Down with the Queen
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I have no choice but to come forward to stop her.] [So you are the witches who oppose me... What shall I do?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Extreme
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I will decide my own destiny!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Opposition
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [How about handing that over?] [That's impossible.] [I'm fine with that, too.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Witch Hunt
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [With the development of this artifact, which can instantly identify the target's magic type, the true witch hunt will begin.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Trace of Kana
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is what we've been looking for. I have to bring it back so we can study it.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Apostle's Scheme
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is a job for you, A-GA. Only you can do it. For the sake of our order, we must get what those people are seeking.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Trance
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This body is suitable. I'm not used to it, so I can't move as freely, but I like it better than Rio's body. Aletheian, they said... Heh heh.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dark Sword Menelgart
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [To maintain the order's strength, the forbidden ritual to obtain the dark sword was completed. The eye on the sword looked around at its surroundings, as if it were alive.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Land and Sea
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Crevasse's purpose is to improve the lives of the creatures of the sea, so she turned the land into the sea.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Steparu
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I am just an observer... My actions may lead to your demise... Is my assistance really necessary?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Student Council
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The next topic is about our tea...] [Huh? Did we have that on the agenda?] [President. The next topic is this week's demerits list...] [Are there any other snacks besides these?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Faltering
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Does she not remember me? Or did I remember wrong? Or maybe...] [In the heart of the bustling Republic, the girl's worries deepened.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Satisfaction
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Haha! There's nothing more suitable for the mural of Vita than a picture of me!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Garden Lady
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Nothing puts me to ease as well as the smell of the morning flowers and the singing of the birds. Are you at peace? This is a good morning.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Everyone's Enemy
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Layna Scentriver is the entirety of the anti-Witch Queen faction. She is in the center of the current situation. Crux and the Federation require the key that she has. They formed an unspoken agreement. The Witch Queen has decided to eliminate Layna Scentriver.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lady Maid Dream
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [My lady...] [Call me by my name when we're alone.] [As you wish...] [And let's lose the formalities...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Discovery
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Fortune took a strange turn. The book that happened to fall in front of Eisenwane contained information about the key to open the door.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Experience
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What a friggin' mess. How the hell am I supposed to fix this? What an idiot.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Relapse
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What am I doing? This sensation... feels familiar.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: GS 5th Star's Strength
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It looks like some insects are trying to get in my way. Whatever. I like taking the fun path.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: The Battle Begins
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A new foe wielding a strange sword appeared in the midst of the factions that were targeting the mysterious witch. She had taken the chance to start a battle.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Clash
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What the... you... you monster...!] [We'll talk after I've defeated everyone here. Starting with you!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Following Memory
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [What? I thought I was the only one who could enter this imaginary aisle.] [It was a simple deduction. Sorry, but if we're going to escape, we're going to have to work together.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Minority Report
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [That white hair... I know I've seen her somewhere before...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Talentium Veritas
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Talentium? I don't know anything about that weird imitation that you're talking about. The only thing I know called talentium is here.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Altar of Kana
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is a place where a ritual is performed for the Creator in order to obtain the magical ore. In order to unlock it, three things are needed. A key, a shaman, and a sacrifice...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Rift
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Haha. Magnificent. Soon, I will be able to send people as well. Who shall I use as a test subject?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Covert Operation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I will do as my sister says... Yes, Linia.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Summon
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Where the hell did everyone run off to?!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Manhunt
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I am the head knight Eisenwane. State your name and rank. Are you looking for this girl? Have you seen this girl?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Backup
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Rose arrived as backup during the battle between A-GA and Eisenwane.] [Head Knight! Hurry and use this opening!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: GS Network

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Gossip

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Miracle
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Glowing butterflies danced about as Helena laid her hands on Red Sun's wounded leg.] [Oh... Look. Miss Red Sun's wounds are healing.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Graphic Novel
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Greetings, Faithful Followers! Everyone wants to be a hero! This book holds marvelous stories of super-powered heroes and crime-fighting detectives; comics are full of incredible tales that anyone can enjoy, including you!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Hot Springs Ticket
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This ticket is required to enter the hot spring baths.] [Isn't this place heaven on earth?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 이벤트플레그

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Discover Evidence
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [It was just a flower that had fallen to the ground, but when Asmis picked it up, it became a lead.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: World is Cake

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Investigation Progress

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Maid Vacancy

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Parliament
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Linia considered any witches who would not join her to be traitors. By pulling some strings, she was able to get a law passed before the Federation Parliament that allowed her to arrest them. The result was phenomenal.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Linia's Counterattack
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Linia, who had always operated from the shadows, extended her hand to Eisenwane out in public. It was a rare sight indeed.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Crisis Averted

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Party Time!

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Growing Congregation

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Witness of Miracles

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Agent of God

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 물물교환

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 프라이빗 룸

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 고기방패

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 막내의 의지

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 각성

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 외로움
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [난 왜 항상 혼자인거지. 친구가 있었으면 좋겠어.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Gauntlets of Darkness
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [In her human form, the Black Lion wields this gauntlet-like weapon. It is made of an unknown material.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Greaves of Darkness
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Along with the Gauntlets of Darkness, this is another weapon that the unknown lifeform they call the Black Lion uses in her human form. As expected, it is made of an unknown material.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Super Strategy

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Memory Loss

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Liberation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [I'm free!] [Wooooow!] [W... Wait!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Maid Part-Time Job

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Entrapment

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Second Volume

SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The Witch Queen has finally started to move.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sanctuary's Legacy
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [As expected, you've brought me an ancient artifact, Odien... How wonderful. With this, Crux can fight for another 10 years!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dark Sword Reclamation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You were carrying a thing like this? Interseting. Should I leave this with her?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Helena's Contact

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Foiled Scheme
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The GS is evil! You won't be forgiven.] [...I wonder if it really is evil.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Flashy Gift Box
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A gift box with pretty packaging. It must contain something special. Just looking at it gets me excited.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Catalyst

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Clue Discovered
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This ribbon is the clue to the missing key. With just this, we can narrow down our search.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Last Resort

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Linia's Refusal

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ripple
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Everything is going according to plan. Like the ripples formed when a rock falls into a lake, the things that have been set in motion cannot be stopped.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sincerity
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Luthica glared at Eisenwane, but Eisenwane didn't notice.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Observation
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [The quartermaster found the hiding person. The messenger had no idea she had already been found.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Demotion
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Because she was deemed an unstable element, Rose and her underlings were all demoted to Blue Cross support.] [She's too dangerous...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Luna's Messenger
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Lady Linia. The master has a proposition for you. She offers an alliance.] [... Master?] [Master Luna Flina.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: New Mission
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [We've confirmed her location.] [Understood. I will go collect her.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: A Challenger Appears

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Prohibition
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Listen! You hear me? I'm going to get very angry if you flip Rio's skirt again! Got it?] [It... it was wrong.] [*sniff*... Sage Lady is scary.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 변화의 시작
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [여태까지 날 지켜본거야?] [물론. 그리고 네가 농구부를 그만두려는 것도 알고있지. 부원이 하나뿐이니깐. 천리교는 어때?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 지우개의 지배자
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [오답이 지워지는 지우개를 갖고싶나? 원한다면 알려주지 내 지우개 전부를 그곳에 두고 왔으니!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 묘족의 관찰자
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [흐흐흐~ 비타학원은 관찰하는 재미가 있다냐!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 발각된 스파이
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [시온~ 그딴것 잊어버려! 만질 수 없는게 보일리 없잖아!] 리니아는 생각했다. ['질문은 필요없겠군. 내 해답은 이미 명확하니깐. 나의 승리는 확실해.']

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 매스리콜
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [에잇! 과자를 빼앗길 순 없어요! 매스리콜!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 주변경호
