SPELL_CARD.NAME: 방패파괴
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [뚫리지 않는 방패를 가져와봐요. 모순이란 단어가 모순이란걸 알게해줄테니깐.] [핀테일은 사용불가 판정된 비품을 가지고 검술연습을 하는데 취미를 붙인 듯 하다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 입국거부
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [당신은 이곳을 지나갈 수 없습니다!] [무슨소리야!] [첨부참조 바랍니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 하늘에서의 재앙
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [저 지평선이 반짝이는 이유는 어딘가에서 날아오는 소녀를 감추고 있기 때문이었다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 피의 전달
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [정말 이 맛있는 걸 마다하시다니 나중에 후회해도 몰라요?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 흡혈의 의식
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: […그렇게 쳐다보니 왠지 이상해지는 걸. 보지 마.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 마성의 소녀
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [….그, 그렇게 이상한가?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 신입부원 환영
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [어서와요. 환영합니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 승천
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [시온, 저곳은 왠지 편안할 것 같지 않아?][근데 왜 우리가 지금 이러고 있지?][글쎄? 등 뒤에서 뭔가 납작하고 아픈 무언가에 맞은 기억은 있어.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 점멸
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [그것은 한순간의 일이었다. 강렬한 섬광이 일어난 이후에, 그곳에는 널부러진 옷가지만 있었고, 그곳에 있었던 존재는 저 멀리에서 이곳을 지켜보고 있었다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 천리안
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [구름위에서완 달리 지상에서의 천리안은 생각만큼 쉽지 않네요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 기다림의 정원
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이곳은 비어있고…. 또 공허해요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 데자뷰
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [전에도 이런걸 본적이 있나요?] [아니.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 대박
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [드디어 나도 이곳을 나갈 수 있어.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 칼날바람
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [저리가, 이 녀석들! 내 본 힘을 봐야겠냐?][구구구구구구!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 날벼락
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [역시 이 장갑에는 특별한 힘이 있는 것 같아요. 기분탓 일까요?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 냉기폭풍
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [추운 건 한번으로 족한데…]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 코인토스
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [기회는 항상 공평해요. 앞면? 뒷면? 후후..]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 박카스의 손
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [술이 다 떨어졌다고? 그럼 물을 술로 바꾸면 되지!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 영지와 추격의 검
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [물결처럼 쏟아지는 은색의 월광과 터무니없이 거대한 검을 등지고, 제이나는 소리쳤다.][크룩스 교국 기사단 제1의 검, 제이나 프리벤터가 방문했다! 가시관 기사단 부단장은 있는가!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 레이나의 소원
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [그러니까 내 소원은! 파팟! 하면서 반짝거리는 마법소녀가 되는거야!][레이나는 대단해!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 암리타의 유실물
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [습격을 받고 암리타를 놓친 아스미스. 그녀가 암리타를 찾으러 갔을 때 발견한 것은 그녀의 탈렌티움 뿐이었다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 심야의 습격
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [뭐지? 네녀석들은?][제단을 순순히 내놓는 것이 좋을겁니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 아이리의 행방
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [리니아… 아이리는 어디있어?][어머, GS단에서 데려간 아이를 왜 저에게 찾는거죠?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 마녀, 마녀를 만나다
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [시니아,리니아가 보낸건가요?][저는 그저 언니의 명령을 따를 뿐이에요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 차원유폐
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [시니아, 당신에게 어떻게 이런 힘이...]시니아의 각성한 힘이 다른 차원으로 연결된 공간을 열었다.

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 사무실 습격
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이리오너라!][히익! 저희는 순수하게 세상의 정보를 추구할뿐 마의 조작같은건 하지 않는다고요?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 부탁
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [로제님, 부디 소마를 지켜주세요. 그녀는 현 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 유일한 열쇠에요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 진실의 개방
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [마치 이제까지의 모습들을 부정하듯 한순간에 변했다. 등 뒤의 날개, 멀쩡한 두 다리. 현 기사단장, 아이젠웨인은 제국사람이었다.-루티카의 수첩에서]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 습격모의
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [네. 우선 우리는 제단을 손에 넣어야 합니다. 여러분은 이대로 비타학교로 가주십시오.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 의외의 해결사
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [논리한 밤에 논리적인 코넌드럼! 크리스님의 명을 받아 사건을 해결하러 갑니다!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 협박
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [아이리양, 우리는 당신의 친구들을 해칠 생각이 전~혀 없답니다. 당신이 우리에게 협조해준다면 말이죠.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 또다른 탐정의 지원
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [아스미스인가? 내가 도와주러 왔어!][내가... 내가 방해를 받다니…]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 아스미스의 능력
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [어..어라? 그녀석한테 빼앗은 주괴는 어디 간거지?][후후… 너희들은 내 능력을 모르지!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 두번째 조우
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [아이리… 왜 싸워…? 그리고 넌…][시..시타?!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 차원역행
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [차원 열리는 소리 좀 안나게 해라!][당신은 누구시죠?][내 이름은 DTD, 시공경찰이지.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 셧다운
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [제 동생에게 무슨 짓이죠?!][무서운 동생을 두고 있군. 걱정마, 네 동생을 조종하는 무언가를 끊었을 뿐이니까.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 어긋난 조각들
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [하나 둘 조금씩 어긋나고 있어요. 시니아와 로제가 곧 이곳에 오겠죠.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 반격의 시작
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [아이젠웨인, 어서 제국으로 돌아가세요!][잠깐! 대화! 대화!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 단결
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [제국의 의도는 파악되지 않았어요. 그녀를 몰아내는게 과연 최선일까요?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 자매의 재회
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [시니아…미안해, 언니가 늦어서. 보고싶었어.][언…니?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 토사구팽
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [결국 아무것도 얻지 못하고 GS는 희생된 것이었다. 마더데몬의 부활을 위한 희생…]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 파멸의 소용돌이
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [GS의 여러분 그동안 수고 많으셨습니다. 이제 편히 쉬도록 하세요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 강림
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [아아... 여러분에게도 맛보여 주고 싶네요. 이 황홀감을…]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 리니아의 세계
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [다름은 틀림이 아니에요. 전 단지 종족의 차별 없이 공존하는 세계를 원할 뿐이에요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 목격
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [쇼핑 중의 전투 목격. 사실 그때 그녀들은 단서를 찾을 수 있었다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 능력의 개방
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [오옷! 나의 세번째 문이 개방하는 듯한 느낌! 내 안으로 힘이 들어오는 것이 느껴져!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 카나의 비밀
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [여기는 카나의 세계가 아닌가요?][도대체 너희 인간들이 카나 카나 거리는게 뭘 의미하는지 모르겠군. 인간이란 것들이 제대로 아는게 도대체 뭐야?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 세자루의 검
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [퍼시피카 가문에 전해 내려오는 3자루의 검은 탈렌티움이 아니다. 그것은 카나의 또다른 열쇠. 검의 비밀은 고대의 신만이 알고 있다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 가문의 비난
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [마더데몬에 의해 카나가 열렸다. 리니아, 카나를 닫을 제물은 어디갔지?][시니아는 찾지 마세요. 카나는 제가 닫겠습니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 메이드의 방해
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [리니아님은 여기 없어요. 리니아님은 시니아님을 대신 해 제물이 되기위해 카나로 향하셨습니다.][제물?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 문의 발견
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이 문은 어디로 통하는 문이지? 혹시 어디로든 통하는 문인걸까? 연구할 가치가 넘쳐 흐르고 있어!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 개량형 탈렌티움
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [우리들이 사용하고 있는 탈렌티움은 가짜야. 그래서 부작용이 있지. 하지만 가짜 탈렌티움에 이 약을 바르면 어떻게 될까?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 강제귀환
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [앞으로 우리의 눈높이에서 세상을 볼텐데, 그래도 괜찮은가?][굳게 닫혀있던 제국의 문이 열렸다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 열쇠의 확보
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [오늘 밤에 당신의 소중한 것을 훔치러 가겠습니다. 라고 해봐야 이미 훔친 후인가?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 이주의 권유
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [정말 지하에 그런 거대한 도시가 있다고?” “항상 어둡고 쾌적한 곳이었어요!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 제단의 의식
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [겜 기르 간… 두 개의 열쇠가 지금 하나가 되어 그릇된 이 세상을 정화할 겁니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 카나의 개방
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [마더데몬이 카나의 문이라 부르며 연 세계의 건너편은, 모든이들이 상상한 카나가 아니었다. 한없이 어두운 곳에서, 무보다 더 공허한 것들이 나오기 시작했다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 매장도서관
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [비타학교 도서관 지하에 존재하는 거대한 공간. 이미 발견된 도서수만 해도 비타학교 도서관의 배가 넘는다. 하지만 아직도 매장도서관의 끝은 발견되지 않고 있다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 비밀의 화원
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: […토모][릴리언니…][릴리아나 26세. Y에 실패한 그녀는 X의 세계로 빠져들었다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 푸른 십자가의 힘
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [플로렌스의 행동력은 놀라웠다. 청십자회는 교국을 넘어 다른 연합국에도 전파되고 있었다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 별의 귀환
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [내부의 위험을 전해 받은 GS첫 번째 별은 서둘러 구원 준비에 나섰다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 감춰진 힘의 개방
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [버림받은 피의 공주. 아이리 플리나는 자신이 사랑하는 사람을 위하여, 능력의 문을 연다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 꽃놀이
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이 옷은 어머니가 예전에 어느 문에서 구하셨다고 해요… 오늘같은 꽃놀이에 어울리는 것 같습니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 백일몽
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [You are Under Arrest!!][헤 헤 헤...][대체 무슨 꿈을 꾸고 있는 거지?][글쎄요...]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 낮잠
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이 옷… 따뜻해… 졸려…]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 임금체불
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [로제님은 이제 돌아오시지 않아, 이제 전 누구한테서 월급 받아야 하죠..?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 해변조사
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [그 날 바다에서 본 투명한 보석의 이름은 저는 아직 모르겠어요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 복수의 저주
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [저주는 저주에 걸릴 각오가 있는 자만 사용 할 수 있습니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 빛의 검
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [마력을 부여하면 검이 나오는 신기한 칼집이에요. 고대의 문헌에 따르면 금발의 남성분께서 사용하던 아티펙트라네요.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 실수
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [기사에게 있어서 기본은 칼을 손에서 놓지 않는 것.][어이쿠 손이 미끄러졌네!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 민간 요법
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [예로부터 상처엔 침을 바른다는데, 부작용이 생긴 탈렌티움에도 침을 바르면 괜찮아질까요? 후후]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 불청객
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [할머니는 말씀하셨지. 두 마리의 토끼를 잡고 싶다면 두 마리를 다 잡으라고... 오늘은 누구에게 기쁨을 줄까나?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 해방된 신성
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [저희가 원하는 세상을 만들기 위해서는 두 가지 열쇠가 필요합니다. 여러분들의 노력은 반드시 보상받으실 수 있습니다.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 산책
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이 세계의 그릇됨을 이 눈으로 직접 보고 이 몸으로 직접 느껴보도록 하죠.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Sword
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A sword made of talentium. No one remembers where the metal came from, but no one cares, either. It's almost frightening how obsessed people are with it. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Glasses
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Talentium has made its way into everyday life. The metal is very easy to process, so people put talentium into just about anything. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Shoes
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [The heels are supposed to raise the wearer's eye level. However, it's hard to figure out if girls really want to look at higher things, or if they're just wearing them to feel better about themselves. Whatever. I prefer comfortable shoes. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Stockings
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Stockings used to be something people would wear to keep their body warm, but times have changed. After they became another piece of fashion, I started to really like the ones with ribbons over the knees. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ribbon
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This is a long ribbon for binding. You can bind anything you want. You can tie it around packages, or tie it around your hair. Last week, I used a ribbon to wrap a birthday gift for my neighbor's daughter. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cat Doll
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [I gave a cat doll to my neighbor's daughter for her birthday. It looks just like something out of a fairy tale, doesn't it? The girl started talking to it right away. She even invites it to her little tea parties for conversation. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Book
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [It's been years since I started writing notes so I wouldn't forget anything. Unfortunately, it's getting harder and harder to keep them organized. I don't remember where I wrote what. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Red Ore
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find red talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Green Ore
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find green talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: White Ore
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find white talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blue Ore
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find blue talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Black Ore
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Ore is obtained from Dungeon matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Talentium is known to vary in color. In some places, you can find black talentium. If you want to get some talentium, the Monster Hunting Bureau recently discovered that monsters carry it around. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Ruins Fragment
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Frontier Ruins and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [The magical stone debris discovered at the outskirts of the ruins. The stone's fantastic cleavage and the prominent techniques used to work the stone are both considered evidence that these ruins were once a place important to the history of the continent. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Heart Stone
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Witch's Tower and Shadowland, and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A witch's mana can only be used by witches. It can't leave the body by itself, so witches make artifacts like these. These witches' hearts, which connect a witch's magic to the world's mana, are called heart stones. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Holy Beast Tear
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Crux Training Camp and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [The Holy Beast Tears are the most important component of the epaulets that signify knighthood. Even the name sounds sacred. However, when you watch that girl as her tears fall, it's questionable if she can really be considered "Holy." - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Bamboo
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Bamboo Garden and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [The famous park, Bamboo Garden, is always full of visitors looking for exotic scenery. However, who in the world is this person who can grow bamboo on this land? Bamboo never grew here before. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lily
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Linia's Mansion and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This flower is a symbol of the Pacifica family. You can find it in any Pacifica household. It's funny because it really suits them. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blood Pack
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Vampire Lands and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [The blood packs are the Darklore's first step towards an organized blood distribution system. The Scardel and Crescent Elders oversee and control the flow of blood packs. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Seal of Approval
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Vita Public School and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] ["Good Joooob! - From Teacher"] [I remember bitter memories of all the hard work I did to get these stamps. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Spiral Fragment
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Vivid World and Dream Island and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [One of the vivid world's oddities. The reason for each world's existence is unknown, but the strange ore that can be found all over this world suggests that it is unusual. This phenomenon takes the shape of a spiral ore. - DKD's Report]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Talentium Pearl
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Premium Material is obtained in the Shop and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [There are many methods to refine talentium, just as there are many shapes talentium takes after refinement. Some of these methods produce talentium pearls. However, regardless of its initial form, the final product is always a card. It's important to cater to the customers' tastes, after all. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Dagger
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A dagger made of talentium. Talentium research has been speeding up, and scholars are looking for ways to utilize the energy it contains. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Panda Doll
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A panda doll. This animal can't be found within the Federation. This doll is made in the likeness of the precious pet of the Pacifica household. The Pacifica house receives royalties for every sale of this doll. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Playing Cards
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A 52-card set. Many kinds of games can be played with them. These cards have brought tears and laughter to countless people. Although I'm a human too, I always find humans fascinating. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Gloves
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [What do you suppose these were used for first? To keep your hands from getting dirty, or to help with work? I still don't understand the mentality of people who wear things for the sake of extravagance. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Perfume
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Because people wanted their bodies to have a distinct smell, perfume was born. I don't really know why they would. I don't remember Rio ever putting on perfume, but for some reason, I can sense a subtle smell coming from her. How mysterious. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Lipstick
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This tool gives Rio a lot of worries when she goes out. She always tries to get the color exactly right, and she spends a long time fussing over it. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pendant
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Accessory is obtained from Fight matches and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A pendant. I sometimes see Rio wearing one. However, you can usually only see the string and not the ornament. It's incredibly annoying. I feel like she's doing it on purpose. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Aletheian Brick
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Catacombs and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A brick inscribed with the symbol of the Aletheians. It's known that when the underground chapel was constructed, each brick was made and placed one by one. As it turns out, though, these were made to order by the Federation's construction industry. - Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Blue Coin
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is a Quest reward. It can be redeemed at the Coin Swap.] [A valuable coin that is blue and shiny. You can use exchange them for Yellow Coins or other prizes at the Coin Swap in the Lab.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Yellow Coin
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is obtained in the Coin Swap, where it can also be redeemed.] [A valuable coin that is yellow and shiny. You can use exchange them for Red Coins or other prizes at the Coin Swap in the Lab.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Red Coin
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This is obtained in the Coin Swap, where it can also be redeemed.] [A valuable coin that is red and shiny. You can use exchange them for prizes at the Coin Swap in the Lab.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Pass
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Ancient Sanctuary and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This pass is issued by the ruins administration to allow people to enter the ruins.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Number Slip
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the 2S Detective Agency and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A numbered slip of paper unique to the 2S Detective Agency. You take a number and leave, then you send your request via letter. I tried sending some just for fun, but they were all ignored... It seems they want to keep other similar businesses in check.... -Esprit's Memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Chocolate
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Have you ever... received these? I have, but they didn't make me happy. Regardless of my feelings, I learned that chocolates were sweet. If you're upset, and someone asks you "How can you eat in a situation like this?", they don't know what they're talking about. - Esprit's Complaint]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Cat Paw Stamp
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Catch That Cat! and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This is a slip of paper stamped with the paw of a cute animal. It says that it was created by the Student Council.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Candy
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Delicious candy. A must-have food for girls' happiness.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Library Index Card
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Underground Library and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [Whenever you borrow a book from the library, the librarian issues you a certain mundane index card.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Mystery Parchment
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from the Underground Altar and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [It was a game passed down from ancient times. This is a record of the strategies that mages used in their sacred battles, carried out in an arena specially made to ensure a fair duel. The ravine that served as their fierce battleground has not been discovered to this day. -Esprit's memo]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Police Notebook
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Royle City and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [This is the notebook used by the members of the Royle Police Force. If someone outside the force came into possession of one of these, it would be a serious problem.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Copper Talentium
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A rare type of talentium with a copper shine.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Silver Talentium
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [On rare occasions, copper talentium will become silver talentium when smelted.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Gold Talentium
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [Gold talentium can be produced by using the most flawless method of refining silver talentium.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Black Lion's Claw
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A claw from the mysterious Black Lion that resembles Nold. Its strength exceeds that of ordinary talentium.]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Replica Stick
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [This Dungeon Material is obtained from Musiciter Land and is used to craft in the Science Lab.] [A souvenir from Musiciter Land. Highly recommended for girls aiming to join Musiciter!]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: Commemorative Medal
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [A glittering gold medal. Where did you get it?]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 차원의 파편
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [카나 곳곳에서 발견된 나선의 파편은, 갑자기 변형되어 더욱 빈번하게 발견되기 시작했다.][획득장소 : 차원의 틈]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 카나의 파편
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [그것이 공간 그 자체의 파편인지, 아니면 카나에서 흘러온 파편인지는 알 수 없다. 하지만 우리가 상상했던 카나의 모습에서는 존재할 수 없는 모습이다.][획득장소 : 카나의 제단]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 레이피어
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [끝이 날카로운 긴 칼. 빠른 공격으로 상대를 제압하는 무기이다. - 이스프릿의 수첩]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 토끼인형
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [소녀들에게 가장 인기가 있는 봉제인형. 하지만 소녀들은 다 큰 토끼의 무서움을 모른다. - 이스프릿의 수첩]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 다이어리
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [소녀들은 자신의 하루와 내일의 꿈을 이 작은 노트에 적는다. 내일은 오늘보다 조금 더 나을 것이라는 기대와 함께. - 이스프릿의 수첩]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 이어링
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [이어링은 아름다움을 위한 희생의 상징이다. 영원한 아름다움을 위한 잠깐의 아픔. - 이스프릿의 수첩]

SPELL_CARD.NAME: 콤팩트 파우더
SPELL_CARD.TEXT: [아이에서 어른이 되는 과정에서, 파우더는 가장 어려운 난관이다. 물론 가장 좋은 것은 애초에 하지를 않는 것이지만. -이스프릿의 수첩]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Student
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What a pretty apron! Ever since I was a little girl, I always dreamed of cooking like this!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Advisor
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Every day, all you make are sweets... Sometimes, I would like to eat something other than cookies.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: New Cook Club Student
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Excuse me... Huh? Are those cookies I smell? Isn't this the Cooking Club?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Svia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sita saved the people of Bakery Town. She's our hero.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Dir. Jamie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sita, don't you want to try cooking today? It's our responsibility, after all. It's important to cook something that will bring happiness to the people who eat it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Katie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I made this dish myself! How is it? It doesn't look too bad, right?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Sylphie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This isn't some common bakery! I should cook something better!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Linfield
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [So what if I only make cookies? As long as people like it, then it's good.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Latecomer
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Late students all look the same when you imagine them. They all run to school with a slice of toast in their mouths. You might say it's only a stereotype, but...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Basketball Player
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Friendship! Hard work! Triumph! Feel the energy of youth! Let's go!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Kouhai
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika-senpai! Are you going there? Can you take me with you? I want to see that monster you were talking about with my own eyes!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 2S Assistant Asmis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Feel free to talk to me. The Secret Service Detective Agency will solve all your problems, no questions asked. How does that sound? Are you interested?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Rainy Girl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This morning, I suddenly had a feeling that it'd be a rainy day, so I took an umbrella with me. And wouldn't you know it, boom! Rain! It always rains when I feel it will.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Prefect Layna
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You there! Watch how you move! Don't mess up your skirt! Just look at how you're presenting yourself!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Lucca
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika-senpai! Don't just sit there and read. Help us sort out the books too! How much extra work do you want to pile on this cute little kouhai?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Serie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika... Hasn't she been spending too much time in the Cooking Club lately? She needs a warning...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Lindt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [People who don't return books ought to be warned. Huh? What's this book?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Vernika
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The world of books really is without limits. Do you read often, Sita?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Gardener Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Miss Cinia, the head maid left a message for you. She said that lunch is ready... What? Precious Pet #2 is lost? Yes, I am responsible for the garden...It's Rose's pet, so I don't know anything about it, but I will do my best to find it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: New Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Excuse me, senpai? How should I clean this? Wow... This vase looks expensive.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Guard Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm committed to the safety of Ms. Cinia.] [You should also be committed to the safety of my furniture, as well as my pottery.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Porter Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Miss Cinia, where are you going? I will escort you! For a maid like me who always stays home, there's nothing more exciting than going out with my master!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Head Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Uh... So.... Why should I be in charge of managing the vacations and salaries of all of Miss Cinia's maids?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Chief Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Senpai, never forget that every maid looks up to you for leadership. You're such a good leader. Now, about my vacation next week...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Mop Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How much longer do I have to mop? I wish the kouhai would get here soon... Like that's going to happen... Maybe.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tailor Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Her curtains are red, her dresses are red, her carpets are red... Miss Cinia, please... Give me a break.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Burning Guardian
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Why? I'm protecting her because that's what I'm getting paid for. The contract doesn't mention paying attention to collateral damage, so I can burn those to my heart's content.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Ward Caster
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This magic is as firm as a shield. Please step back. I will protect you.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aristocrat Girl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [That's boring, that one, also that one... This book is boring too. Why can't you write a good story? It was my own fault to expect something good from you. Forget about it. You're fired. You can go now.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Inscribing Magician
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This place was inscribed with a spell. When you pass by, don't stay quiet. Silence is what triggers the spell.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apprentice
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Huh? Why did this happen? This isn't what the book said the spell was supposed to do... Eek! I'm scared!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Relena
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't know much about the outside... I just know that you are my protector.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Private Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Might I ask why I was hired differently from those personal maids, Lady Rose...?] [I just had somewhere to go and needed someone to go with me. That's all.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Senpai Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't rush. Take your time. You'll have a hard time if you try to learn everything about a house this huge at once. Take it step by step, okay?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Striker
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [There's nothing I have to say to a villain! There's no point to questions and answers! The heat of this flame can burn anything!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Inspiration Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I feel an omen that something will fall from here tomorrow. Someone will fall from a great height. You... You're a Crux Knight, right?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: New Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I will gladly fight alongside the senpai knights! Just help me out if I get into trouble. This sword? It was given to me by someone I respect a lot. I love this sword as if it were a part of my own body.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Medic Knight Sillit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Is anyone injured? Let's take a break. The injured should wait here, then come with the second wave!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Flag Knight Frett
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [May I plant this here? Ah, no matter how many times I look at it, there's no flag more beautiful than that of Crux. Isn't that right, Luthica-senpai?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Adjt. Sarisen
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't think that it'll be difficult to weaken the vampires. You just need to eliminate their leader. Just concentrate on locating her, Luthica.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Mytyl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [No one cares about where I am or what I'm doing. It's like I'm invisible. I never thought that my presence would be helpful to anyone, Miss Luthica.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Pintail
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You, who embrace the night and hunt for blood... are unforgivable!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Guard Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Ugh... How much longer until my shift is over?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Terra
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [No... I don't want to fight any more. Peace... I want to live a peaceful life...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Saint Sword Girl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Protecting the seminarians is my responsibility.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Messenger Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I just need to deliver this letter to the Empire, right? Hah! Piece of cake! It's going to be just dandy... I'll be back soon, Miss Jaina.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Priestess
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Belief in a single thing brings everyone together. So please, don't lose faith in your beliefs.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seminarian
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [We start every day with the wish to strengthen our beliefs. If I hold the cross tightly, I can feel something invisible growing stronger and stronger.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apprentice Nun
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [When I see a clean church, my heart also feels clean. When I clean away dirt, I feel my heart being cleaned.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Sienfield
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Are you interested? This is magic that must be paid for by blood. Can you really use it, knowing that it's human blood?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Amethystar
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Lydia, what happened to you? I'm a bit curious. I'd say it's... important to dig into this. And it just happens to be raining too.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Lydia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [We shouldn't make any rash decisions. We'll have to investigate the knights before we take action.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Acolyte
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It isn't time for Mass yet. Could you please come again when the church bell rings?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Faithful
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I wanted some time alone to think, so I came early... Unfortunately, I came too early. Why did I come this early?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Conundrum
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone's been looking forward to the Flina Family Quiz Convention, and it's finally here! Who will answer these questions? I, Conundrum, as the Crescent representative, will try my best!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Chardonnay
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [When you're lonely at night, a bottle of wine is your best friend. Is there any wine you like? Of course, these days, I never drink... wine.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Sion Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Okay. Listen. I don't want to be someone who plays tasteless tricks like you. If you want to play, then play with people you run across on your evening strolls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Rion Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sion! Sion! I came up with some great new pranks! They're hilarious! What do you think?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Pinot Noir
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a perfect wine, aged to perfection through the years. It possesses a unique and exquisite taste. Of course, humans don't call this wine. This is a special wine for us, and it flows inside your body. That sweet, sweet wine...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Moondancer Kata Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you see the eyes of the audience blinking in the pale moonlight? Don't you want to have a try? You'll be a great stage prop. Well, your blood will. Hee hee.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Kris Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Conundrum, when will you stop quizzing yourself? You should at least try to go to the Quiz Convention. Just one time, please? Everyone else is going.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Nyetimber
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Conundrum is still too young. If she tries to take the night quiz, she'll fail. I'm 100% certain. She's just a little girl. Hmph.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Merlot
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Feel free to talk to me. My heart will listen to every concern you have. Of course, I can't promise that I'll always have a solution.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Carmenere
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You shouldn't keep all your worries bottled up inside. How about discussing them with Merlot?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Shiraz
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Why? Exhausted? If you're tired, then talk to me. We're family, aren't we?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Woodbridge
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Ugh... What can I do? Should I ask some vampires...? I don't think I'll get the answer just by sitting here doing nothing.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Master Luna Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is not the time to judge Iri Flina. By withholding judgment, I will protect her for a while longer. The Elders are too arbitrary, so I will handle this by myself.

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Deviation
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Stop thinking inside the box. You'll have to think big if you want something new.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Vampire Cultist
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vampires... Aren't they cool? I long for the moon... I want to join you!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Red Moon Aka Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sister, why did you give authority to those Elders? We could kill them, and nobody would care.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Moon Becky Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How about letting me handle the Elder issue? The vampire population is just going to get smaller if you give this to Red Moon.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Zombie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Huh...? Is there something wrong with me?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Campus Idol
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I never told them to do anything. I just told those lost little girls about a place where they could relax.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Clerk Fran
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Senpai! If you keep doing this, I'm going to reveal all of our minutes to the teachers!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Suzie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I've got my eye on you. Even if your name isn't listed now, by the end of the month, your name will be on the demerit list.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Milka
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The book will be due next week. Please remember to return it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Casey
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It isn't touching their skin, so they still aren't obeying the rules! Their bodies need to be told the consequences of breaking the rules.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Treas. Amy
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't go over budget this semester. Student council events and compliance with school rules might bring unexpected changes, but no matter what, don't go over budget.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Pres. Celine
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's no big deal if we go a little over budget, Amy. We can make up for it next semester, so please remember to list my tea costs on the expense report.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Genius Student Nanai
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Tell me anything, Celine-senpai. There's nothing I can't handle. I've been aware of the grand truths of all creation since I was 10, so please trust me.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Detective Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Examine everything! Don't let a single clue slip through. Lately, there's been something funny about the maids. They must be doing something behind my back... Hmm...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Magic Teacher
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Listen, class. The basic principle of all magic is to understand the structure of the spell you need. Never forget this. To make sure you remember this, there's going to be a test tomorrow.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: School Envy Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's such a pity that a uniform like this is only used in those ordinary sorts of schools.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Insomniac Nanasid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Her eyes start to open because of a strange voice, but when her eyes are open, no sound can be heard. This cycle repeats itself over and over again. It's said that when her eyes are closed, she can see something.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Fanatic Sarah
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a sign of obsession. She's obsessed with glasses. She even has a pair of sleeping glasses.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Traumatized Hilde
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [In her case, she has been avoiding contact with people she does not know. In the presence of strangers, she shows signs of extreme anxiety. She has begun blacking out, so further study has been discontinued.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Stigma Flint
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [S-Stay away! Felicia, you go first! I'll stop the church's attack myself, no matter what it takes... Will we meet again? Of course!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Fated Rival Seven
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You said your name was Nanai, right? I didn't expect this much from you. Remember this! Next time, I won't lose.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Nurse
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Oh, Dr. Kamyu? You... You used to be an OBGYN, didn't you? How did you end up in a place like this...?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Stigma Witness Felicia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Flint... I'm here... One day, my heart will touch yours. I will wait until that day comes.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Christina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [S-Senpai! I'm doing a research survey for Crux. Could you please spare a moment of your time and answer a few questions? S-Senpai!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Irene
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What brought you here to the lab? Did you want to see a woman without the time to date anything but books? Oh, good. Sometimes, I just want people to chat with. Did you have something to say to me?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Laura
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What brings you to the church? I'm touched by the belief people have in the Goddess, no matter how busy their lives are. I want to make the church into a place where people can always come when they feel confused or troubled.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Lucia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Heh. That book that senpai brought me is really interesting. I was so busy reading that I forgot the time.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Melissa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't force yourself. I'll handle the exploration and excavation. I'll also try to keep the knights from getting in the way. Irene, please just focus on research. Where are the next ruins? I want to see more amazing artifacts.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Sinclair
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [No worries. The knights are completely different from the church. We'll guarantee your safety. In the meantime, could you tell us about your little sister in more detail?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Puzzle
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Another piece... More, just a little more... Aah, this is my world.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Sangiovese
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How about shopping at night? We can enjoy ourselves on this street without revealing our identities. This place is different from Crux. I like this street.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Viognier
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I came just like I announced What? Is it reasonable for a thief to be so brash? I'll never give up on anything I want. Every warning is a promise.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Reading Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Eventually, I'm going to finish that tower of books. How will I survive the boredom once I run out of books to read?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cauldron Witch

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tea Party Witch

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Heart Stone Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a tool for the study of witch magic, a heart stone, also known as the treasure of the sages. I just want to live a life of freedom. That's all. Get ready. Refuse to be bound by limits. Open the control circuit. Wipe out all enemies before you!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Undertaker
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Grandma always used to say that we should respect everyone's freedoms... Of course, I didn't like grandma.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Visitor Ophelia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Where is this place? Where is the professor? I can't go back now. I have to make up my mind. But... Who are you, really?] [You don't know the greatest sage of the continent?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Rhona
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The ball will vanish. It's one of my four reversal techniques. To defeat my senpai, I'll train in every ability!

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Mai
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Your tennis skill can never be perfect. What you are lacking is something you need to discover for yourself.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sleep Club Student

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Daisy

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Manager Lotte
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Listen, Serie. Someone put those weird books on the book request list, and it was either you or Lindt. I'm going to reject these, alright? That "Glass Library" publisher was weird to begin with. From now on, any cobalt blue books are going to be rejected. If anyone wants to read them, they should buy them with their own money.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sita's Friend Rosie

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Ace

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Ace

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Occult Club Iris Juvia

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Arcana XVI Tiwa

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Smartylane

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Canaiolo
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The Elders are starting to make their moves... What do I do?! I just want to live a quiet life.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Muscat

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sweet Lady Isfeldt

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Student

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Student

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sleep Club Advisor

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: New Lib. Student

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Milty

FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia... This is a little...] [No, it's fine. I'm fine, but it's a little hot.] [Gah! M-Miss Linia!]
