FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Really? I can do whatever I want? I can burn and torch everything as much as I like? Ahahahaha! I love you guys. I get to burn as much as I want!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Agent
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [For the glory of GS! Mission accomplished. What's our next assignment? Are we going to Crux?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Colonel Z
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [My mission is to deliver the general's message and lead everyone. The distorted wheel of time turns again, and everything points to Crux.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Elder Chenin
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Disaster finally came down on our leader, but somehow, I just can't bring myself to care. Moving on, what do you other Elders think about the invasion situation? If Crux wants to bring ruin to our home, we could use this opportunity to have those filthy mixed-bloods shield us, couldn't we?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dark Master Vernika
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Now.... Kneel before me. Look up. That's right. I'm different from the losers who stood around doing nothing. I think I'll enjoy the nights a little more, now.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Vampire Hunter Iri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika. I will free you from the frivolous night. This sword of fifteen magical eyes can kill you.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Rio
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vote for your favorite girl! It's too bad I didn't get to be a candidate this time.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Game Starter
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the first step. Never forget how you feel at this moment.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Summer Santa Ninian
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The seasons don't matter. I'm doing this now because peoples' desires peak in the winter. So what do you wish for? A rose witch?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Dispatch Layna
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Our school is having an event soon, and it's very important. No problems or accidents will be tolerated.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Linia's Maid Seron
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Now I'm working here too... Right? It's still a little awkward, so... Aheh.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Lydia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm really tired. I think I'll take a nap. Now where did I put my glasses?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Luna Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What are the Elders trying to do? They can't just make any moves they want. I need to investigate this.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Coin Girl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Tell me. Heads? Tails? Same odds, really. You wouldn't be one of those people stupid enough to think it'll land on tails just because it landed on heads last time, would you? Heh... But I like those kinds of people.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Ace
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [One shot with all my soul. This is my favorite saying. There's no turning back. You can only win.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Roroa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The event is coming soon, so I can't take it easy. I can't lose to my big sister. I have to get everything ready!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Elsfi
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Her cooking skills are one thing, but her knife skills are unmatched in the entire Federation. She can slice ingredients faster than the eye can see.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Coordinator
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The event is nearly here. I'm just checking to make sure everything is working as planned. Be sure you're using approved materials and that there are no problems with the food.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Marie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [These ingredients hate me. *sniff*]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Lure
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Gah! I'm late! I need to brush my teeth and wash my hair, and, oh, dry my hair... Ah! The time! The time!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Campus Waitress
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an apron designed specifically for the school's special restaurant. How does it look? It's a nice design, isn't it?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Exec. Maron
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Well... This equipment can finally see the light of day again... *cough* Eew. Look at that dust!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Doubt Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Why are you giving me that look? Are you lying to me? Go ahead. Try to lie.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Rainbow Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's a rainbooow! Eek! I'm soaking wet!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Perfect Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What is this? Do it again. All of it. This place must be spotless.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 2S Sink Queen 571
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [If it's in the sea, leave it to me! There's no ship that can escape my mines. My art is an explosion!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Mist Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [She has the power to turn her body into mist. When she absorbs the sword of mist into her body, no one can track her.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Beach Volleyball Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hm? Am I at a disadvantage? My body is in peak condition. I can win this!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Guitar Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't just listen to my sound. Listen to your heart. The guitar's six strings carry a message of the human experience.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Ice Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Some time ago, girls with special powers began to appear in the Royle Academy. No one knows why those girls hid their abilities, and no one knows why they started to display them openly.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Supplier Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to leave this delicious food behind and report to duty now. I can't be late!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Noel
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I have the key on me. Can you figure out where it is?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Manager
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Make sure you always maintain your equipment and supplies. If you lose anything, we won't replace it for you. Keep that in mind.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Elda
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Ah? It's been a while. There's something noisy happening outside. I wonder what it is.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Linda
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This school uniform is too tight. I couldn't find a uniform that fit, so this is going to interfere with my activities.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Lifreya
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I guard this door. However, I don't carry a key. I just watch the people go about their business.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Messenger Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to spread the word... The GS have entered Crux!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Quartermaster Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How much longer do I have to keep cleaning up after you? Even if you gave me a raise, would it really be worth the work? What are you even doing?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Unit Felgus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The fighter created by the Scardel Elders with no personality, but maximum fighting ability. With every victim, she seeks to become more and more efficient.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Unit Azoth
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The fighter created by the Crescent Elders with an emphasis on independence and adaptability. She can accomplish her duties even in the light of day.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Spy
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Oops, I forgot to take off my scarf. Am I... caught?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Assault Soldier
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is my second year with the GS. I will destroy everything anything in my way.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lightning Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I respect your goal and will. However, I'll have to reject your offer as I prefer my own freedom, Witch Queen.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Business Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a special opportunity for you. Please look at this proposal and make an appropriate decision.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Creepy Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You want to be the center of the Federation? You dream big. I like your scheme, but next time, come back with a better situation. That's when I'll think about it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 1st Star
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The GS has nine Stars. I am the first among them. Once we are in place in Crux, the Second Star will come looking for us.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 2nd Witness Kana.DND
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The fate of those who pass through the door will be changed. My role is to destroy those fates. Do not interfere, DKD.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Coin Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The origin of the magical power in the coins is desire. Desire drives everything. Happy Birthday!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Event Inspector
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I can't make any exceptions. Look over the fireworks budget again and resubmit it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Guide
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The Tennis Club event is open! Come and visit us!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Advisor
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't deny every student request, but you should really rethink your list of book requests, Serie.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Critic
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [She's the daughter of the owner of "Omnivore", the Federation's greatest four-star restaurant. Even now, she prepares food with a talentium knife and has the power to make delicious meals.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Press Winfield
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm Winfield, from student news. I'm here to take a picture of the president. Is she in a swimsuit? ... Gotta sell that.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lunia Scentriver
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [There's something happening in Crux. Layna, could you take care of mother while I'm out? I think this is worth seeing.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dejected Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [My replacement still isn't here... How much longer do I have to mop...? Augh....]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Unemployed Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [After negotiations for better working conditions and a higher salary failed, she finally left Cinia.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Occult Lady Rainia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Lady Rainia has been studying a ritual to create rain. On most days, she has a 20% chance of success, but during the hotter seasons, it's super effective.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Occult Lady Charlotte
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Everything looks beautiful in the rain. In this outfit, I don't need to be concerned about getting wet, right?] [Lady Charlotte... Using an umbrella as well is unnecessary.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Envy Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Her power comes from jealousy. Lilianna is 26 years old, and she wants to destroy every couple she sees.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Shock Lady Elberto
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Why can't I do whatever I want? The new chairman ignores us, and it's boring to just practice on monsters day after day. It's no fun unless it's with an actual person.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [... You want to enlist? This is no place for sheltered ladies like you.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Renya
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Are they crazy? Why is it suddenly okay to start recruiting Myo clan?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross June
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I sell flowers on the street, but my real job is to find truth among rumors.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Melissa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Amethystar! Work more carefully! You wouldn't want to damage any priceless artifacts.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Amethystar
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Yeah, yeah. I know. By the way, Melissa. I've been wondering. What are those things that are always on your head?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Swimie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's scary! Water is like space! Humans can't breathe it!] [You may have the power to manipulate water, 2-A Corporal Swimie, but if you're going to act like that, it's not going to be easy...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Wednesday Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the day when the power of water is strongest. Water spells have the best chance of success today.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Unit Antares
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [A Scardel fighter. She doesn't have any confirmed kills yet, but in the last battle against Crux, she proved her worth by engulfing the whole place in flames.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Unit Gungnir
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [A Crescent anti-personnel fighter. When she picks a target, she single-mindedly removes it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Sniper
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [So these are the new weapons they sent out. How do I shoot with this thing? Where are the arrows?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 2nd Star
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [There's the flare. It's red; they must have accomplished step one, but something's wrong. They couldn't find the portal?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Soul Conductor Charon
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Already here? Great! Got your ticket? Step on the gas!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 3rd Witness Kana.DTD
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [People who distort time and space to create their own worlds cannot be forgiven. My duty is to preserve the balance of the worlds by erasing unnecessary worlds.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Coin Producer Ritz
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Congratulations, producer! Your perfect plans brought your desires to life! Happy birthday!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blade Tutor Grace
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Never put your sword down! This is the basic rule of sword fighting!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sword Girls Sita
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Esprit muttered. Somewhere in her room, there was something she could use to modify it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Animal Suit Sita
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Vernika, what's with this outfit?] [You're so cute, Sita! This concept will definitely help us win Fashion Queen!] [I don't feel like it.]] [Come ooon, Sita! Okay?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sword Girls Cinia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I found it! I thought I'd have to look all over the world!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Animal Suit Cinia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It suits you, Cinia.] [I do like pandas, but this outfit is a bit much, Linia. Please give me something else to wear. Fashion Queen? What is that?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sword Girls Luthica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sage Lady, what are you doing? ... She's not listening.] [Luthica... Grrr...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Animal Suit Luthica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Luthica, how are your new pajamas? Lu... Luthica? They're pajamas, but you still have to wear something under. Oh no! What's that string?!] [A... a sacrifice for fashion... *sniffle*]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sword Girls Iri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Esprit is obsessed with those girls from that other world.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Animal Suit Iri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Wait, what? Why do I have to wear such a low-quality costume? Explain right now!] [If you gave me more time and money...] [No excuses! We can't win Fashion Queen like this!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Press Student
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I want to take a picture of the student council looking cool. I'll be with you anytime, anywhere!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Producer Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [A maid that manages other maids. A white collar maid who doesn't do any actual chores. No one knows why the position exists, but it's probably because the master hates doing work.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Irene
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Did you find the artifact? I'll have to see it to believe it. This discovery could change Crux history. It can't be used carelessly.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Artisan Baker Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I could finally open my very own pastry store. Attention customers! If you pay extra, you'll get a free mug!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Gart & Sita
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Agh! You idiots! Are you doing things without my approval? ... Oh, that's it. You asked for it!] [Coo! Coo! Coo! Coo!] [Hurry...] [H-Hang on, Sita! Ack! It's burned!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cinia's New Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The new maid. They call her "The Last Accident." It seems unlikely that all of her accidents are just bad luck.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Adjt. Luthica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I see stars, butterflies, and the endless sky.] [Your psychological state has a lot of anxiety and insecurity, Adjutant. You should exercise caution.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Hunter Becky Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The day is coming. The day when the shadow of the Witch's Tower, filled with the accumulated knowledge of the witches, will cover Vampire Lands. It's time to balance things out.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Fiona Scentriver
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The mother of Layna and Lunia Scentriver. She vanished after she was sent to the Empire. She is now a legend.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Rhea
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Wow... To think that our school had a library like this in the basement.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Kamit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The number of books in the underground library is nearly infinite. Before I graduate, I will complete this map.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Press Lyrica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a a first-year member of the student council who has taken charge of public relations. With her golden hair, emerald eyes, and that little fang, she's attracted as many fans as any idol. A lot of students came to see her today, too.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: LL Lady Tomo
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [She likes girls, and she does a poor job of hiding it. If people happen to be girls, then she loves them all. They call her the Lady Lover.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Zislana
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia began gathering the witches. The witches that her letter touched left their nests to gather under her. Zislana is one of them, but she has a horrible sense of direction.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Elemental Lady Chirushi
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hot winds! Hurricane! I summon the elemental power of the Lord of Wind! He is the magnificent Cy-] [Lady! What are you doing?!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Sgt. Seyfarf
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What do you think is the most important tool to bring to a battle? It's a shovel! A shovel! With a shovel, you can even destroy mountains! Don't look down upon the 7th squad!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Sarah
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The code that Irene deciphered utilizes the literature of a particular era, so these have become an important key.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Veltier
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the girl without memories who joined the knights with Rose. She was appointed to a special task force that served directly under the new head knight. She won't talk to anyone but Rose.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian B-NA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is to spread God's teachings. As proof of the enlightenment that our shaman speaks of, we will reveal God's true form.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian A-GA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [A judge? The end? I don't know. I just like the teachings of the Aletheians, so I want to practice them each day to show my faith.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Schindler K Eru
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Just sign here. It's time to put your faith to use. Nooow... We will share God's rewards with you.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 4th Witness Kana.DDT
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: ["She's dangerous and she's a suspect, so she must be secured." Codename: VAN-KIRAS. In order to erase unstable worlds early and defeat their architects, she possesses the ultimate power of suppression. She has no equal in any world.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Kana.DTD
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [My policy is to eliminate all possible risks.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Vitelle
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Her ability to shrink herself is helpful for exploring places within the massive underground library.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Orte
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Within the underground library exists only the smell of old books and pitch black darkness. With a flashlight in hand, I proceed nervously. It sounded like some old books fell somewhere! I hear something skittering! Did I imagine it?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Explorer Ritana
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I heard a rumor. "I saw a monster," they said.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Dauner
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [She has more talent than an ordinary person, but whenever she fails, she always gets really depressed. As a result, she can never get high scores.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Prelitch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Reeefreshing! Pretty Witch Prelitch!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Shut-In Lady Neetness
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Outside is hell.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Alameda
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone's just digging around in the dirt, hoping an artifact shows up? Artifacts aren't going to show up just because you read and dig holes.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Adalia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This artifact joins bodies together. What do you think? Does my partner look healthy? Heh heh...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Lagerfeld
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to research this.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian C-EDA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [People have to eat! In order to free ourselves from the cycle of poverty, we have to change! Are you hungry? Eat this.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle D-RA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't lose your faith. Let this book be your compass.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Nether Merchant Minac
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Special sale. Everything is rice.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: One-Winged Edelfelt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This isn't the place either; everything's outdated. We can't use this place. There aren't any gates we can use as a point of entry.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Temp Sinclair
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's nice to meet you. Wearing a school uniform again really takes me back.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Nanai
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sh-shut up! Will you stop staring at me like that? It's making me dizzy!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Fake Knight Undertaker
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [So this is your uniform? Grandma once said that clothes are like wings. I can't fly, though... How boring.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dark Witch Seven
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Everything... should just disappear.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Press Maiyen
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Um... Attention... Please listen...] [The megaphone that the president handed her was pointless at best.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Gatekeeper Prefect
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Even on cold days like this, we still have to watch over the school gates. Isn't it too much?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Enforcer Bella
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [President, don't be lazy. I know I'm not the only one thinking that, but you know how even eagles hide their talons?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Supersonic Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The toughest, peerless, greatest master of cleaning and cooking. Any kind of housework that she takes over is finished in a flash.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Ruin
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Faster than light! This broom cuts across the sky!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cosmo Lady Tikin
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Every star we can see has some importance.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Lynn
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The goddess's army can never be defeated! For the glory of the goddess!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Finder
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hm... I smell a new artifact. How exciting. What kind of item could it be this time?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Taras
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The Seekers have been focusing on studying artifacts until now. Now is the time to use their power. For the glory of the goddess!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Reshuri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [That's right. Trust me. That place has what you desire.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian E-ROMA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hey! Over there! Form a line. Crowds always bring trouble.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Grenache
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Ah... You have a lot of guts to look me in the eyes. Shall we see if you have the skill to back it up?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tearless Rinoa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't believe in wishes. I think that just being able to go to sleep and live to see the next morning is lucky. I ended up falling deeper and deeper.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Press Rouyer
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You're missing out on some good food. Hey! You over there. Come try some of this.] [Her recruitment tactics are a bit strange.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: New Council Student
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Joining the student council is like a dream come true.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Pres. Celine
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Celine has returned to the duties of the student council president. Sometimes, she appears to be uneasy, but she's actually very calm and stable.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Indomitable Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [No matter what happens, she'll never give up. Her family motto is to have an indomitable will. However, her family went under; regardless, she still won't give up.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Gale Witch Cadet
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [For real? Wooow! Are you out of your mind? That fast?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Royle Chair Lady Linia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I merely give the students suggestions for what they should do.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Eizit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't neglect organization. You never know when your life may depend on it.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Infiltrator
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [On most days, I'm the idol of the shop: the waitress! However, my true identity is...!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Dir. Sigmund
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Pursuing research in order to slake your thirst for knowledge... Isn't that enough? Using ancient powers to fight... What are you trying to achieve?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian F-RIVA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I will be the lantern to guide you who wander through the darkness. Please listen to the teachings that I bring.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Enemy Neki
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Have you ever seen a vampire drinking blood? I can't hold myself back any longer. Ire... I miss you. I wonder how a vampire-hunting vampire's blood tastes.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Time Witch Herionne
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Even among the witches, she's very mysterious, as if she lived in a different time from the others.] [What do you desire? Eternal youth? Isn't that a trivial thing?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aberrant Rio
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: ["How have you been? I see that Esprit is still as cute as ever," the woman asked Rio. This is one of the reasons that Crux protected her. More specifically, Rio is not an existence that is completely rooted in this world.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Kar Vistas
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Transform! Go! Musiciter Dress Up! This is the melody of the soul, roused by our fingertips!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Sleuth Asmis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Something's going on in that detective agency. Rosie's actually been getting orders from the Secret Service too!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Linus Falco
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The chair's activities are strange. I have to investigate the Royle Academy's restricted areas. Something is going on...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Rose
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This assignment may be very dangerous for Veltier. Please reconsider this assignment, Head Knight...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Head Apostle Helena
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [My mission is to spread our teachings and show the people the right path.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Help Monthly
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The cold energizes me. It helps me identify which students are troublemakers.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Unlucky Cook Club Girl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Her luck is terrible. She can't defeat her hunger, and every time she goes to the club room, the door is closed.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Two Lib. Aces
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [There isn't enough room for two aces, senpai. Isn't it about time you stepped down?] [I could, but do you have the right to be my successor, Miss Tesla?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Delinquent Witch Cadet
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Whaaat? Is this some kind of joke? This is sooo annoying!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Cadet Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't have to do anything like mopping anymore! I'll find my own path in life!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Destiny Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This lady leaves her fate to the cards. She firmly believes that her future can be found within them.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Siskin
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Have you seen Rose? She's so feminine and cool! Hm... She's really different from my sister.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Ina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [We Seekers have become powerful in combat because of the artifacts, but I wonder if it's really alright to rely on them... It frightens me.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Tommygun
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This artifact allows you to commune with animals. Interesting, isn't it? These children have their own laws and ideas, too. In the name of the Goddess.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Ben Rie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You can't. Are you trying to take away my teddy bear, too?] [The girl in the basement hugged the ruined teddy bear tightly.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Pi
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [That's right. Your sacrifices will not be in vain. Now, press onward!] [The believers responded to her eloquence.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 4th Star
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Thank you, sister.] [I gave in to those words. Those words melted all of my negative thoughts away like snow. I always maintained a calm and dignified exterior because I knew that whenever I turned around, I could hear warm words from my younger sister. I could give everything up when I heard those words.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Black Myo Kitt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The last part of Nold's report was Kitt. She is the guardian of the world's lamentation and sorrow.] [Really now...? You think you've found a way to ease my burden! Hah! Yeah, right. I don't believe you, but I'll come along.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Black Dragon Incarnate
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I wonder where those beings called outsiders come from and how they got here... There are also cases of beings simply passing through this world. This year's outsider is this woman. -Esprit]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Coin Child
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Is something bothering you? Don't hide your desires. They're as plain as the sky is blue.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Engineer Gepette
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Youse in trouble too? Thought you'd just be just okay if ya came here? Well, I can take ya home, so hold on!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Crasher
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You're still only making cookies every day? While I was out there doing other things, this is all you did? *nom nom* ... and the taste isn't even that good.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Amanda
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Huh? Too many? Aren't tools the most important things for a cook?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Ritafarit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Isn't it thrilling to cook when you're tiny? It feels like I'm a chef mouse!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Traveler
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm always excited to travel.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Lady Elfenritt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Everything is thanks to Musiciter! We will change your destiny!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Lady Freesia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Come back! We will wash this world's tears away!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Eternia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Is this... an artifact?] [At that moment, a voice echoed through Melissa's head.] [Melissa? Only you can hear this voice.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Pipit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Next time, I'm aiming for your throat. Watch yourself, even if you don't see anything, and even if you don't hear anything.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Ibis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This shield has been blessed by the goddess. Can it even be scratched?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Silvaner
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [No. It's my doll... No.] [There wasn't just one girl locked up in the basement clutching a teddy bear. What kind of place is this...?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Familiar Chuchu
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Each witch chooses a familiar based on her own preference. Among the wide variety of familiars that witches have chosen, there are even some that can't even be categorized as animals. There exist some witches who have gone to the forest to make fairy dryads their familiars.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Enchanting Witch Curea
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What a lovely night. Should I go make someone happy? Romantic love? Passionate love? Hahaha.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sita Vilosa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm looking for my master's stuff... Have you seen it? My name? Sita Vilosa.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cinia Pacifica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hahaha... Does anyone exist, other than myself, who can truly be called the perfect blend of wit and beauty?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Luthica Preventer
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [My name is Luthica Preventer! I fight for the pride of the Crux Knights. Prepare yourself.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Iri Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What kind of person would make me an outcast just because my existence is different? My name... Iri. Iri Flina.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 티타임의 학생회장 셀린
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [차를 끓여주세요. 위클리 양. 아 없나요? 위클리양은 어디갔나요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 폭풍의 전학생 시스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이 학교에서 가장 강한 건 누구지?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 하복의 시타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [추워.. 빨리 갈아입게 해줘.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 사안의 마녀
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [그러지마요, 이상하군요. 바깥 세계는 어떻게 돌아가고 있는거죠? 퀸이 리니아 라구요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 퓨어 메이드
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [안녕하세요. 주인님? 오늘은 어떤 일을 먼저 하실까요? 식사는 조금 더 기다리셔야 한답니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 다크레이디 세븐
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [나나이 하이캐슬. 오늘 엄청난 암흑이 당신의 영혼을 사로잡을 겁니다. 당신이 다른이에게 안겨주려 했던 절망은 오늘 당신을 찾을것 입니다!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 포이즌 루티카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [맞으면 전투력이 상승한다는 소문이 있던데, 확인해 볼까?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 파괴의 기사단원 핀테일
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [당장 달려가서 GS 놈들을 끝장 내겠어!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 기사단의 막내 로토리
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [등의 상처는 검사의 수치. 하지만 동료를 구하기 위해서였다면 훈장입니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 독서의 마녀
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [에에.. 이 빵은 여기에 놓으면 되나요? 힘드네요.. 이 일. 탑이 무너지고 나서…. 괴로움의 연속이에요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 마녀 파르푼테
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [베호이미! 이것좀 봐! 신기하지 않아?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 크레센트 코넌드럼
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [정답입니다!] [해냈어요! 이제부터 절 논리왕이라고 불러주시기 바랍니다!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 황색의 왕 카넬
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [흠.. 어떤가? 내 위엄이 드러나는가? 노란색이 권위와 위엄의 상징이라고 했잖나.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 유류자 소저너
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [왜? 내가 신기해? 그럴만두하지. 풉….크흐흐흑 아이고 웃겨라. 뭐야, 안 웃겨? 이거 우리쪽 세계에선 빵터지는 개그인데말야]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 현자 어린이
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [누구야! 누가 창고에있는거 맘대로 만진거야!] [히힛 현자언니 꼬맹이됐네?] [리오 너! 창고에서 넘어지면서 뭘 만진거야!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Librarian Milka
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You want to go look around in the underground library? Well... right now is a bit tough, Miss Asmis.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Fiddle
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sitaaa! The W2T Bakery has some new bread today. Do you want to go try some?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tennis Advisor Miki
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What business do you have at the Tennis Club? Are you interested in joining? If you apply now, you can join easily!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Spirit of the Library
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Rumor has it that a spirit roams the deepest parts of the underground library.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Heat Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm a slow starter. I'm gradually burning brighter.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Cutie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [People usually call me cute, but... I would rather be called pretty.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Detective
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I will definitely find whatever I set my sights on. That is, as long as I deem it worthy.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Southern Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This warmth is nice. Working is good, but sometimes I need to rest.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Executioner Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you wish to test your luck?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Prea
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This sound will wake people up no matter what. It's a Pavlovian response that you'll never forget for as long as you live.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Kraros
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You will not see the end of this day!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Oclette
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The sword is a mirror that reflects its owner.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Sion Rion Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Rion! Stop that! My skirt...] [Hmph. You still get embarrassed, even though it looks nice.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Myo Informant
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [If you require aid, we will provide it. The Myo Clan can move freely through the shadows.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 6th Star
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm cooperating with you because it's our leader's wish, but I don't need any help. I will just eliminate everything in my way.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Ancient Forgotten God
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The summoning preparations weren't quite sufficient, but it was still enough to make something happen.] [The God of Truth? Don't make me laugh. I'm not that fool.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Press Hermes
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Today's front page of the Vita Daily is about a rumor about the recently discovered underground library! Please subscribe!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Katie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This weekend, we're having a welcoming party for a new club member! You're coming, right Sita?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Apprentice Iri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I... I'm just here to talk to that girl!] [But doesn't that apron look good on you?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Glasses Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I think you'll like this wine I prepared. How are you enjoying the picnic?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Producer Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm a manager, so why do I have to do this sort of work? Where did that maid go?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Vid & Lady Lon
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Royle Academy's mystery-unraveling duo. The shadow pursuer, Vid and the lightning-quick thinker, Ron. These two have begun investigating the chairman's plans.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Guard Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [C-Could this be revenge for being late to my shift?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Mytyl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [A place like this under the school... How surprising.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Leader
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Yes. I am L...eader of the Blue Cross.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crescent Kris Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [... My memory is fuzzy. I feel like I know this place.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Red Moon Aka Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Did someone come here before us? Well, they'll have to get out of our way.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Moon Becky Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to agree with Red Moon this time. Our number one priority is our safety.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Clerk Fran
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm the secretary, but... Susie has been writing more things than me... Didn't I become secretary to write things down?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Bernoulli
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The air here is strange... The principles of fluids don't apply to this place. Does magic reside in the air?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Nanai Highcastle
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Call number 63i.7.F215f... The "i" doesn't refer to the alphabet. Could the rumor of the imaginary sector be referring to this underground library?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Jackpot Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I did it! I did it! I won the lottery! Jack! Pot! Now I can join the world of the ladies!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lonely Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Somehow, everything is so boring when Master Cinia isn't bullying me... Am I a masochist?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Madness Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Master Rose hasn't returned. I have to have someone to work for.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Member
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Yes, next patient. Where does it hurt?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Cygnus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What am I thinking about? About when I first came here... It hasn't been that long, but it feels like the distant past. I wonder if I've grown a little?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Flag Knight Frett
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's dark, and there are so many books... For some reason, I've got a bad feeling about this place. More importantly, Pintail-senpai is a staff sergeant now... Maybe I'm next...?!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Undertaker
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The energy here feels familiar. Is she coming?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Ire Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Could it be that the vampires can no longer be found in their own lands?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 5th Star
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Our leader believes "that" thing is here in this... library?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: White Whale Crevasse
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Everyone! Say it with me! If we all sing together, we can achieve quadruple happiness!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Esprit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Esprit wasn't very different from how she is now when she was young.] [Do you have a problem?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Gerangeran
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Gerangeran is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Kim Sang Min
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Kim Sang Min is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Rang Ddo
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Rang Ddo is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Masatokki is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hwansang Gobuk is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Onesound
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Sita
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Cinia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Luthica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Iri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Onesound is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 JOANA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [JOANA is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Bungurly
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Bungurly is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Gil Se

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Dova
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Dova is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Yami is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Guigui
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Guigui is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Year 1 Nardack
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Nardack is celebrating the first anniversary of Sword Girls.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Morning Council Pres.
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The student council president's mornings start very early. She looks dignified even while relaxed. It's because she works hard.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Jamie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Oh my, are you the new transfer student? Do you like spicy food?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Rangers
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [We, the Library Rangers, carry out the justice of the library! We don't shoot out beams, but we're still strong!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Rich Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Now I'm a full-fledged lady, too... I'm tearing up.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Broker Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Do you need my help? We can talk about the work after the payment is settled.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Lady Linus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Musiciter? Alright. I'll listen to what you have to say. I'm in a really good mood right now, anyway.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lancer Knight Shane
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I told you. The outcome has already been decided.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Melissa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How do I feel? Great. I need a place to release all this energy building up inside of me.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Head Knight Eisenwane
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I will show no mercy to the opposition. I will count anyone who tries to protect the witches as the opposition. The opposition.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Red Sun
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Lately, Miss Helena has been participating in the activities of other people. She's been listening to Schindler's reformist views...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Herionne
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Palomporom. Time will assist you and her.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Head Luna Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [According to Cabernet, the most important thing right now is the safety of our kind.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Sylphie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Sita in her everyday clothes is some nice eye candy! However, the new club member is a formidable opponent, too!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Helper Weekly
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Seriously... Are they going to treat me like I'm just a missing part of their inventory? I'm the ace of the weekly helpers! This is my comeback.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Kingmakers
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Tieria and Amy are the core of the student council. Celine's high approval ratings are partly due to her charisma, but they would be impossible without the outstanding management abilities of these two people.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Maid Lesnoa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Ever since that day, you've been obsessed with some kind of power... You haven't laid a finger on your work, either. So... you won't do it anymore? My lady?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Maid Fio
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You shouldn't waste a single minute, or even a single second. The basic principle of all work is to stay on schedule by performing efficiently.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Lady Sevia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Welcome to Musiciter, Miss Linus. First, why don't we choose a codename for you?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Marksman Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Having better equipment than the enemy is a basic tactic.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Sillit
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Have you heard of a medic who wears clothes unbefitting of a doctor?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Lukif
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Carry a sword. The battle for life and death is no place for lame things like magic.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian G-NUSA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Miss Helena's words are the same as those of the God of Truth. She has my complete trust.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 7th Star
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Is Crux after the same thing as our leader? More importantly, that person is... the new head knight.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dark Sword Master A-GA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [You don't need to know anything about me. Just don't get in my way.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Tigress Felpix
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What? A fox? Can't you see that I'm a tiger? Hmm. Well, believe whatever you like.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Sita Vilosa
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [One of the basics of survival is to prepare for when you'll be hungry again, even after you just ate.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Cinia Pacifica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's been a while since I left the mansion, but this is nice. I heard that you can find some cute animals somewhere... Shall I try going there?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Luthica Preventer
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [If you call yourself a knight, you have to work hard at all times. However, it's hard to suppress the desire to eat snacks.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Iri Flina
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Going out in the morning isn't too bad. Going out at night is still better, though.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Girls' Harmony
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [If destiny exists, the girls will meet again. Whether they want to or not.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Snowty
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Most of the Library Club members went to the underground library. We haven't been getting many visitors lately, either, so the library feels so lonely.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Devourer
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [An outside sponsor of the Cook Club. This aristocrat girl loves the snacks that the Cook Club makes.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Girl Detective Asmis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [In order to solve this case, you need courage. The courage to lie to your lover, the courage to admit defeat... You need at least this much courage.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Paladin Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [We and the police work together to uphold the public order of Royle City.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Elberto
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Linia is a difficult lady to understand, but she has hired me as an agent.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Guitar Witch Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't have any hopes or dreams. I only have my guitar, now. Please listen to my "Soul".] [Her performance of "Guitar for your Soul" resounded everywhere.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight's Parrot Kocchan
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Drill! This is a drill for a level 2 security breach!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Knight Manager
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Please let me know in advance if you plan to take a leave next month.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Beryl
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hold on... That's a beautiful crystal you have there. Will you lend it to me for a bit?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Scardel Unit Tyrfing
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is one of the Scardel's covert soldiers. During emergencies, she carries out independent missions.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Reshuri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [According to Schindler, I can use this. A miracle, huh... The traditionalists are better than I thought.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Apostle Red Sun
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It left a scar, but I can walk without a cane now. Miss Helena...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 5th Witness Kana. DDD
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Yes. Yes. Understood. Please continue observing for now. It's still too early to make a decision.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Hecate M. Jane
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Layna, is there something troubling you that you can't tell me about? I won't ask you about it, but you can always come to me if you have any worries.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Researcher Albert
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I believe that the power of talentium is absolute. For example, if a person uses it while in a moving frame of reference, it will appear the same to both the user and an outside observer. I wonder if my theory is correct.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Research Head Von
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [What's going on in the back room of the library? Talentium smelting? Eh... Hm? I should try wearing glasses? Nooope! I'm a different kind of character!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Arctic Lady
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [It's hot. How can people live in a place like this?] [Please take off your coat, my lady...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Liberated Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm finally liberated from that crimson hell! I'm free now! I can do whatever I want!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Maid Scientist
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The world moves by the power of science. Do the higher ups understand this?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Youngest Knight Rotori
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I have to become stronger! I will grow like Cygnus-senpai did!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Supplier Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Yes, I'm on my... Eek!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Odien
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I don't have time to talk to you. Get out of my way!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Witch Palomporom
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [After listening to Herionne, I can't allow things to go on like this any longer. I will find the creepy witch and that girl.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Agent
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [5th Star mentioned someone with a strange sword... Who could it be? There are one or two people it could be. More importantly, did the Aletheians have that kind of power? They aren't the pushover sponsors we thought they were. First, I need to make contact...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Helena's Right Hand Rue
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Don't worry about who I am. I merely convey Miss Helena's will. Just obey my words.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Riftwatcher Schrodinger
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Let's see, let's see. Ooh... This place looks interesting. Shall I pay it a visit?] [Hovering between time space continuums, the very existence of this mysterious existence is a mystery.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 잠입마녀 파르푼테
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [위치퀸의 뒤를 밟아서 왔는데, 교복이 너무 꽉 끼네요. 요즘 아이들은 원래 발육이 부진한가요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 동물옷의 레이나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [고…공보원!][이것도 학교의 이익을 위한 것이랍니다~]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 카페의 시타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [여기…좋아…][그치? 여기 분위기 정말 좋지?][아니..파르페]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 정원의 레이디
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [발밑을 조심해주세요. 작고 섬세한 아이들이랍니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 죽림향 레이디 페니카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [따분하구나. 내 주인은 대체 어딜가서 날 산책시키지 않느냐.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 시니아를 아끼는 리니아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [오랜만에 언니가 솜씨를 내서 사과파이를 만들어봤어요. 맛있어 보이지 않나요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 신성연구회 오디엔
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [신비를 찾는 여행은 고독할 수 밖에 없는 걸까요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 기사단원 핀테일
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [언제까지 숨길 수 있을 거라 생각하시는건가요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 교국의 루티카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [역시 교국의 공기는 상쾌하군요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 크레센트 코넌드럼
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [야호. 최신식 마녀 빗자루를 손에 넣었다. 이 속도! 이 감촉! 최고야~]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 무녀 헬레나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [인간들의 단순함은 마음에 들어. 그 녀석도 왔겠다. 이제 조금씩 움직여볼까?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 조련사 아이리
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이 채찍은 감기는 맛이 있어. 사용하기 좋은 걸. 하나 장만해야 할까?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 수영장의 카넬
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [내가 사용하는 튜브에 뭔가 문제라도 있어? 뭘 그리 쳐다보는 거야?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 선배 뮤지시터
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [아직 모든게 어색하지? 걱정하지 마. 누구나 처음엔 다 그러니까. 내가 하나하나 알려줄게.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 미소짓는 베르니카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [베르니카는 자신의 주변을 떠도는 나비들을 바라보며 미소지었다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Nold of Darkness
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the human form of the enormous beast that they call the Black Lion.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dark Soul Nold
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the human form of the Black Lion, with her power unleashed. Somehow, she resembles Nold.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Alchemist Yi Ensan
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [One person only needs a teaspoon of love potion, so why in the world would anyone need a whole gallon? Well, that"s none of my business. I just need to deliver it to... What was her name? Linia?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Fan Layna
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [And that spirit is what's so charming about Musiciter!] [I didn't know that!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lib. Assistant Jin
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Senpai is so cruel to give me this much work. I don't think I'm ready to devote my life to this...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Council Casey
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Great concentration, mental revolution, a single slash of the sword. Swords can cut objects, but your heart can cut your soul. Understand, Sita?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Twins Sion & Rion
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How is it? If I'm dressed like this, I can be elegant, too.] [You're weird, Sion.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Lady Cox
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I enjoy investigating the Royle Academy students, but I like this dress too. I will keep it in my memory.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Lady Irea
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I, Musiciter Irea, have appeared to put an end to the witches' evil deeds!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Seeker Kano
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Here's the thing you wanted. What's it for, anyway?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Silent Knight
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [After the incident at the underground library, there was an extra knight who wasn't there before. She didn't speak to anyone except Veltier. Oddly enough, nobody questioned her presence, so she managed to blend in.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Double Agent Luthica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The rumors that you were in league with the outsiders were true! Were true!] [It'd be pointless for me to try explaining myself. Listen, I have some valuable information for you. How does that sound, fallen bird?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 2S Informant
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Let's get to the point! Here's the information you wanted.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian Hania
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Even if I have to sacrifice my own body, I will do anything our shaman asks.] [The Aletheians eventually held blind devotion.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS Leader Schindler
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [How long has it been? The Aletheians have nothing more to give. It's a shame that the completed dark sword vanished.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Sionrion Extreme
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The weird bird that Sage Lady sent flying gave us new powers. Shall we count up your sins?] [Sion!] [Rion!] [Maximum Drive!] [Extreme!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Sion
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Ack! There was a time limit? Hmph. We're still not finished yet! Rion!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Dress Up Rion
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Of course! Sion, let's go!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Baker Svia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Finally, ULTIMATE WHIPPED CREAM GET! You're mine, whipped cream! This whipped cream will have my family name so that everyone knows it's the greatest whipped cream!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Cook Club Coordinator
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The final step in cooking is the decoration. However, to achieve the perfect decoration, you must put yourself in the food's shoes.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Summer Council Susie
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I'm not always cold. These flowers always make me happy. Hm? My face isn't pale, and I don't have a serious wound!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Part-Time Maid
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a great place for a part-time job.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Marionette Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The Pacifica family needed her ability to control dolls at will.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Musiciter Lady Linus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Okay. I can do it! Arise, power of justice!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Scribe
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [The Blue Cross will support Rose from now on.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Crux Knight Sophia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I will begin the hunt for the dark sword.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Blue Cross Rose
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I foresaw this as well. However, I didn't see myself wearing these clothes.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Wise Witch
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Oh my. This isn't good. The negative energy is getting stronger. We can't just wait around for an opportunity...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Aletheian Sous-Chef
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Schindler gave me some mystery ingredient that's supposed to be good for the body. She told me to put it in the food, but to do it without anyone finding out. This feels wrong.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Fugitive Aletheian A-GA
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Can I survive on my own?] [...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Summer Tesla
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I know I can't swim, but... you didn't have to make me play this penalty game... What do I do if someone sees me...]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Summer Linia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Master Linia, is something bothering you?] [It's just... hot. It's just the heat.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Summer Vanguard
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Whew. Water tastes like honey after you finish training.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Summer Cabernet
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is what they recommended for summer, but... why do I feel even hotter?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 농구부원
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이번 비타문화제를 통해 스포츠의 가치를 널리 알리고 싶어요! 더 이상 혼자서 리바운드를 할 수는 없어!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 요리연구부 고문
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [새로온 그 아이 말인가요? 저는 딱히 부원을 들이는 것을 반대하지 않아요. 게다가 귀여운 것 같으니 무조건 찬성이랍니다]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 요리연구부원
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이번 문화제에서 그동안 갈고 닦은 요리 실력을 뽐낼 거랍니다! 괜히 신경쓰여서 다른 곳 들리지 마시고 꼭 요리연구부부터 들러주세요!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 몹메이드
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [왜 전 아직도 대걸레를 들고 있을까요. 누군가 이 대걸레 지옥에서 벗어나게 해주세요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 인스피레이션 레이디
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [그 아가씨가 화를 당한 모양이네요. 역시 제 감은 틀리지 않았어요]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 선배메이드
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [오랜만에 예전 메이드복을 입어봤어요. 어떤가요 리니아님?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 크룩스기사단 핀테일
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [최강의 검사는 최악의 요도조차 절세의 명검처럼 다룰 수 있다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 성도검사
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [신학원생들을 찾고있습니다. 혹시 못 보셨나요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 신성연구회 리디아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [전 더 이상 감당할 수 없어요.] [멜리사, 이런걸 전에 본적이 있나요?] [안되요 그 구역으론 가지말아요.] [전 정말 모르겠어요, 저흰 이 싸움에서 벗어날 수 있을까요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 뱀파이어 컬티스트
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [미안하지만 아가씨, 저는 지금 좀 바빠요. 제발 실험이 끝날때까지 절 방해하지 말아주세요.] [흡혈귀들의 힘은 정말 신비로워요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 크레센트 코넌드럼
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [진실은 저 너머에. 코넌드럼의 논리는 결코 멈추지 않습니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 아이리 플리나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [태양의 반짝임은 때론 너무나도 눈부시기에 치명적이라고 하지….] [기억하나?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Badminton Sita
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is a racket...?] [That's right, Sita. You just take it and "bounce" the ball back.] [... Do I have to bounce it...?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Archery Cinia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I was slightly worried that I would miss if the wind blew. However, I focused everything into my own hands and shot with confidence.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Judo Luthica
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I will end this in a single match.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: Ping Pong Iri
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [That ball. It will return to me.] [Th-That's! That's the "Flina Zone"!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 윈드 걸 후우
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [수령님을 찾아야 한다라비. 수령님이 좋아하는 것들을 챙겨서 데려와야 한다라비.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 모교방문 핀테일
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [어머 핀테일 무슨일이니? 오랜만이구나! 근데 그 교복, 졸업한 지가 언젠데 지금도 딱 맞니?][선생님!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 시타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이제, 여기서 일하는거야?] [잠깐이겠지만요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 옷도둑 시온리온
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이게 아이리의 교복인가?][이쪽은 하복인가봐!][좀 크지?][시온한테는 많이 클껄?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 레이디 리그니제스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [맛없어…. 게다가 따분해. 날 좀더 즐겁게 해줄 사람은 없는거야?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 마녀 리안나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이 옷을 입으면 빗자루로 하늘을 날 수 있을 것 같은 기분이 들어요!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 레이디 넥시아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [무녀복만 입다가 이런 드레스를 입으니 부담스럽네요. 이 드레스 잘 어울리나요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 청십자회 써니
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [뭐죠? 지금 청십자회의 이 릴렉스(RELAX)하지 못한 느낌은? 전 이미 알고있어요..]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 청십자회 갓트
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [으윽 여긴 성도의 축복을 받은 여성들이 너무 많아. 어라? 어디서 많이 본 아이들인데… 내 착각인가?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 청십자회 파르푼테
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [신비한 장갑이네요]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 마검의 정령 메넬가트
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [무섭지 않아. 무섭지 않아. 무섭지 않아. 무섭지 않아.][네가 제일 무서워!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 일곱 번째 별
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [사람이 가장 무방비해지는 저녁 8시.. 이렇게 걷는 것도 나쁘진 않네]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 밤의 성수 시그마
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [술 상대를 해주러 온건가? 그럼 이 와인은 어떠한가.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 게임의 지배자
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [모든 게임은 다 해봤어… 이제 질린단 말이야! 이럴 땐 뭘 해야 하지…]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 요리연구부 린필드
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [어라? 왜 문이 열려있을까? 거기 혹시 누가 있나요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 포위당한 아스미스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [데려갔을 땐 마음대로였겠지만 지금은 아니란다.][제길, 그건 학생회장에게 한정된 이야기가 아니었던 건가?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 과거와 미래의 관찰자
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [내가 그걸 찾으려면 어디로 가야하지?][짜증나는 놈이 왔군… 뭐 로제란 녀석을 찾아봐. 네 해답은 그녀석이 가지고 있을테니까]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 시약의 마녀 컬티스트
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [후후후..세상은 변하고 있어! 세상이 변한다면 미약의 성분도 변해야 하는 법!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 추격자 리누스 팔코
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [아스미스가 위험해! 어서 도와주지 않으면…]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 시공간의 마녀 시니아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [언니를 해하려는 자는 이 세상에서 배제하겠습니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 조언자 소마
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [아직 그녀에게 신성연구회 옷은 무리인것 같군.][동감이에요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 안티위치퀸 로제
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [리니아와의 싸움은 이제부터야. 모두 날 따라와줘!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 신성연구회 루티카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [돌아오셨군요 루티카님. 제이나님에게 말씀 들었어요. "그곳"에서 원하는 답은 찾으셨나요?][감사합니다. 시그문드님, 아직 답은 찾지 못했어요. 하지만 한가지 확실한건 지금 교국은 위험에 처해있어요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS특공대
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [돌진합니다. 공격합니다. 그것은 세번째 별의 작전.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 여덟번째 별
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [아이들을 위해서 잠시만 GS로 일하는거야. 근데 너희들의 목적은 대체 뭐지?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 아홉번째 별
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [아이리를 손에 넣은 지금, 남은 위험요소는 안티위치퀸 뿐입니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 마법소녀 레이나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [트랜스 매지컬! 마법소녀 레이나가 정의의 이름으로 당신을 용서하지 않을거에요!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 발견자 오르테
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [제단과 열쇠가 준비되면, 이세계의 문이 열린다. 그리고 제물을 통해 이세계는 다시 닫히는건가? 그렇다면 그 제물은 어떻게 되는거지?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 도망자 암리타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [내 탈렌티움을 놓고와버렸어…하지만 분명 탈렌티움은 올바른 자에게 전달되었어…]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 탐정 리누스와 아스미스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [너도 자칭 탐정인가?][난 정말 탐정이거든?][뭐 그 건방진 안경잡이보다야, 네가 도움이 되겠지?][나를 다른 누구와 비교하지 말라구!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 테일러
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [저는 천을 좋아합니다. 푹신푹신한 시간이거든요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 코넌드럼
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [크리스님 이 옷 저에게 딱 맞네요! 어디서 구하셨어요?][후후, 코넌드럼 귀여워요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 진홍의 마녀 시니아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [리니아 언니, 용서할 수 없어요. 대체 절 통해 무엇을 이루려고 하셨던 거죠?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 신성연구회 라우라
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [세계가 혼돈스러워요. 이럴때 일수록 저희의 믿음을 굳건히 해야합니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 크룩스 기사단 스이미
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [제,제가 날고 있어요!][스이미 상병의 갈길은 아직 멀다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 왕의 귀환 제이나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [루티카, 이제까지 믿고 따라와줘서 고마워.][제이나님, 돌아오셨군요!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 스카델 키리에
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [어째서 여름이 끝나도록 바닷가에 한번 못 놀러 가보는 거냐고!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 천리교도 전도사 비나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [여러분, 저는 천리교도의 신자, 비나입니다. 제가 이 자리에 선 것은, 진리의 신의 진실을 고하기 위함입니다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 마더데몬
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이제 더 이상 신세를 질 필요는 없겠네요… 저는 그릇된 것을 고쳐야 해요]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 폭풍전야의 셀린과 나나이
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [평화롭네요. 이런 나날이 언제까지 이어질까요?][약간의 안식 뒤에 이어질 파란, 흥미롭지 않나요? 후후, 농담이에요. 셀린선배.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 붙잡힌 망령
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이거 놓아라! 내가 누군지 알고 이러는거냐!][당신의 근원이 당신을 찾습니다. 같이 가시죠.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 좌절의 리타패릿
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [아아… 우리의 요리연구실이… 우리의 요리연구실이!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 종결의 목격자
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [카나. 그곳은 사실 거울의…][오르테가 마지막 구절을 읽으려는 찰나, 책이 어디선가 날라온 섬광을 흡수하면서 닫혀버렸다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 인스피레이션 레이디
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [거대한 폭풍이 다가오고 있어요. 이 폭풍속에 누군가는 어긋난 만남을, 누군가는 헤어짐을 겪게 되겠죠.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 레스노아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [리니아님, 가지 말아주세요. 그녀들은 리니아님을 원망하고 있어요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 레이디 시니아와 로제
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [시니아 그동안 많이 힘들었지?][아니에요 언니…이제 계속 이곳에 있어주실거죠?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 청십자회 토토
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [예전부터 교국은 한번 와보고 싶었어요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 신성연구회 라가펠트
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [문의 주변에 떨어져 있던 이 기차모형은 뭐죠? 네? 작은 뭐를 조심하라구요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 기사단 제이나와 루티카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [앞으로도 옆에서 잘 부탁해 루티카][네, 제이나님!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 아홉번째 별
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [순순히 따라온다면 유혈사태는 일어나지 않을 거에요.][너흰 이용당하고 있는 거야.][정확히는 공생 관계죠.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS 참모 아르디타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: 봉화를 올려 각지의 단원들에게 알리세요. 아직 GS단은 끝나지 않았습니다.

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 기도의 헬레나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [저의 어리석음으로 인해 거짓된 존재를 불러내고 말았습니다. 이 기도가 여러분에게 닿기를…]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 추석의 아스미스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [어때요 어때요? 이쁘죠? 귀엽죠? 정말 고마워요! 뭐 저한테 어울리지 않을 옷은 없겠지만요!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 추석의 리누스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이게 한복이라는 옷이야? 활동하기엔 조금 불편하지만 마음에 들어.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 추석의 로제
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [언니, 그 옷은 마음에 드시나요?][응 아름다워, 고마워 시니아. 오필리어님에게 감사의 말씀 전해주렴.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 추석의 헬레나
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [신도들의 선물인가요…? 정말 좋은 옷이군요…감사합니다. 근데 이 머리띠는 이 옷과는 별로 상관 없어보이는데요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 제2 황녀 하노벨
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [레이지온의 두번째 황녀. 하노벨입니다. 제국에 오신 걸 환영합니다. 연합국에서 오신 분들이시죠?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 도서관의 문지기
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [내 역할은 도서관의 정문을 지키는 것. 하지만 너희는 뒷문으로 들어왔더군. 그건 내 역할은 아니니 딱히 신경쓰지는 않아]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 레이디 마리 루넨
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [시종이 없어 외로운 날엔그녀는 페X로 로일 초콜릿을 먹는다. 페X로 로일 초콜릿, 5개들이 3천GP.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 청십자회 플로리아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [플로렌스 언니는 정말 대단해요. 이 장갑과 언니만 있으면 모든걸 해낼 수 있을 것 같아요]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: GS연구소장 나이트로
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [시간과 예산이 충분히 있었더라면 이런 굴욕적인 상황에 처하진 않았을 텐데! 다음엔 두고 보라고!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 요리연구부 에이스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [하늘을 가르고! 땅이 울리는! 초우주적인 음식이다아!!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 도서관 관리자 암리타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이 책만 1024번째. 그분이 오실 때까지 이 도서관의 책을 몇번이나 더 읽어야 할까?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 요리연구부원 아라스
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [어머 선배님들, 오셨나요? 선배님들을 위해 제가 요리를 해봤어요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 별의 레이디 치루시
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [마동! 파멸! 신비로운 별의 힘으로 당신을 파멸시킬께요!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 레이디 시니아 퍼시피카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [리니아가 준비한 옷을 매번 버리던 시니아를 위해 리니아는 특단의 조치를 취했다. 그녀의 옷장에서 그녀의 드레스들을 모두 치워버렸다][리니아 언니!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 세론과 코코
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [메이드들은 휴가를 맞이하여 세론과 코코는 리니아의 사유지 해변에 놀러갔다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 크룩스 기사단 오클렛
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [빛의 검을 사용하는 기사단의 일원. 그녀의 검은 빛을 베는 정도의 힘이 있다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 꿈꾸는 핀테일
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [핀테일은 오늘도 꿈을 꾼다. 자신이 전역하여 교국을 뛰노는 모습을, 하지만 그녀의 꿈속에서도 군복은 벗지 못했다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 한복의 루티카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이런 옷을 한복이라고 하던가요? 오필리어씨께서 살던 곳은 이런 아름다운 옷이 있다니 부럽네요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 제압당한 천리교도 에이가
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [네 친구들은 어디있지?][꺄악!? 누구? 이 넝쿨들 기분 나빠!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 고대의 코넌드럼
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이 석판 매우 논리적으로 살아 움직이고 있어요! 근대 이건 뭐라 적혀 있는거죠? 잠시만 기다려 주세요? 라고 적혀 있네요. 무엇을 의미하는 걸까요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 수영복의 언더테이커
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [간다!라고 그랬으면 예 라고 대답해야지!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: HH Asmis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the prototype of an Asmis homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: MH Asmis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Asmis homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: RH Asmis
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: HH Linus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the prototype of a Linus homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: MH Linus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Linus homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: RH Linus
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: HH Rose
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the prototype of a Rose homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: MH Rose
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Rose homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: RH Rose
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: HH Helena
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the prototype of a Helena homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: MH Helena
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Helena homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: RH Helena
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: HH Isfeldt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is the prototype of an Isfeldt homunculus made from chocolate. She's still incapable of communicating properly. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: MH Isfeldt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [This is an improvement off of the prototype Isfeldt homunculus. She's gradually starting to show expressions. Good, I'll keep working on her. - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: RH Isfeldt
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [I made some more improvements to make her more realistic, but did I go too far? - Clarice's Research Notebook]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 도서부 연구부장 폰
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [128√e980 뭔가 의미가 있는 수식이라고 하는데 모르겠어요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 계사의 나나이
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [선배 요르문간드라고 아시나요? 대지를 지키는 뱀이랍니다.][에? 그게 아니지 않나요?] [선배! 삼라만상을 깨우친 제가 잘못됐다는 건가요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 정월의 시타
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: […정어리?][시타! 정월이야! 정.월.][어려워]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 가더와 컬티스트
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [요즘 저택에 사람들이 절 피하고 있어요][후후..그런 당신을 위해서 준비한 이 약, 드셔보실래요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 메이드 오필리어
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [어째서 제가 이런…][일하지 않는 자 먹지말라 몰라?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 준비의 레이디 시니아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [뭘 그렇게 보시죠? 옷 갈아입는거 처음보시나요?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 연결의 무녀 넥시아
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [요즘 교국내의 혼란이 가속되고 있어요. 이럴 때일수록 기사단 여러분의 도움이 필요해요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 웨딩드레스의 핀테일
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [이 옷은…헛…나...결혼하는 건가?][언니, 전역부터 하셔야죠.][그녀의 1132일째 밤은 이곳에선 결코 맛볼 수 없는 소녀의 달콤한 꿈이었다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 기다림의 기사단 루티카
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [루티카님 뭐하고 계세요?][숨 쉬어요.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 언더테이커
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [오랜만이야 내 친구들! 잘들 지내고 있는 걸 보니 이제 슬슬 이쪽으로 올 때가 가까워진 것 같은데?]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 퀴즈왕 코넌드럼
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [제 정답은요. 60초 후에 공개합니다!]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: 티타임의 아이리
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [네가 좋아한다길래 준비해봤다.]

FOLLOWER_CARD.NAME: L. Ophelia
FOLLOWER_CARD.TEXT: [Hello again! It's been a while, hasn't it? It's been… a year? Let's look forward to an even better year going forward.]
